1389        // applied to all characters
1390
1391        $GSUBFeatures = $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['GSUBFeatures'][$scriptTag][$langsys];
1392
1393        // ALL should be applied one syllable at a time
1394        // Implemented in functions checkContextMatch and checkContextMatchMultiple by failing to match if outside scope of current 'syllable'
1395        $tags = explode(' ', $usetags);
1396        foreach ($tags as $usetag) {
1397            $LookupList = [];
1398            foreach ($GSUBFeatures as $tag => $arr) {
1399                if ($tag == $usetag) {
1400                    foreach ($arr as $lu) {
1401                        $LookupList[$lu] = $tag;
1402                    }
1403                }
1404            }
1405            ksort($LookupList);
1406
1407            foreach ($LookupList as $lu => $tag) {
1408                $Type = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Type'];
1409                $Flag = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Flag'];
1410                $MarkFilteringSet = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'];
1411                $tagInt = 1;
1412                if (preg_match('/' . $tag . '([0-9]{1,2})/', $usetags, $m)) {
1413                    $tagInt = $m[1];
1414                }
1415
1416                $ptr = 0;
1417                // Test each glyph sequentially
1418                while ($ptr < (count($this->OTLdata))) { // whilst there is another glyph ..0064
1419                    $currGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['hex'];
1420                    $currGID = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'];
1421                    $shift = 1;
1422                    foreach ($this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Subtables'] as $c => $subtable_offset) {
1423                        // NB Coverage only looks at glyphs for position 1 (esp. 7.3 and 8.3)
1424                        if (isset($this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$c][$currGID])) {
1425                            // Get rules from font GSUB subtable
1426                            $shift = $this->_applyGSUBsubtable($lu, $c, $ptr, $currGlyph, $currGID, ($subtable_offset - $this->GSUB_offset), $Type, $Flag, $MarkFilteringSet, $this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$c], 0, $usetag, 0, $tagInt);
1427
1428                            if ($shift) {
1429                                break;
1430                            }
1431                        }
1432                    }
1433                    if ($shift == 0) {
1434                        $shift = 1;
1435                    }
1436                    $ptr += $shift;
1437                }
1438            }
1439        }
1440    }
1441
1442    function _applyGSUBrulesIndic($usetags, $scriptTag, $langsys, $is_old_spec)
1443    {
1444        // $usetags = 'locl ccmp nukt akhn rphf rkrf pref blwf half pstf vatu cjct'; then later - init
1445        // rphf, pref, blwf, half, abvf, pstf, and init are only applied where ['mask'] indicates:  Indic::FLAG(Indic::RPHF);
1446        // The rest are applied to all characters
1447
1448        $GSUBFeatures = $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['GSUBFeatures'][$scriptTag][$langsys];
1449
1450        // ALL should be applied one syllable at a time
1451        // Implemented in functions checkContextMatch and checkContextMatchMultiple by failing to match if outside scope of current 'syllable'
1452        $tags = explode(' ', $usetags);
1453        foreach ($tags as $usetag) {
1454            $LookupList = [];
1455            foreach ($GSUBFeatures as $tag => $arr) {
1456                if ($tag == $usetag) {
1457                    foreach ($arr as $lu) {
1458                        $LookupList[$lu] = $tag;
1459                    }
1460                }
1461            }
1462            ksort($LookupList);
1463
1464            foreach ($LookupList as $lu => $tag) {
1465                $Type = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Type'];
1466                $Flag = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Flag'];
1467                $MarkFilteringSet = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'];
1468                $tagInt = 1;
1469                if (preg_match('/' . $tag . '([0-9]{1,2})/', $usetags, $m)) {
1470                    $tagInt = $m[1];
1471                }
1472
1473                $ptr = 0;
1474                // Test each glyph sequentially
1475                while ($ptr < (count($this->OTLdata))) { // whilst there is another glyph ..0064
1476                    $currGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['hex'];
1477                    $currGID = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'];
1478                    $shift = 1;
1479                    foreach ($this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Subtables'] as $c => $subtable_offset) {
1480                        // NB Coverage only looks at glyphs for position 1 (esp. 7.3 and 8.3)
1481                        if (isset($this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$c][$currGID])) {
1482                            if (strpos('rphf pref blwf half pstf cfar init', $usetag) !== false) { // only apply when mask indicates
1483                                $mask = 0;
1484                                switch ($usetag) {
1485                                    case 'rphf':
1486                                        $mask = (1 << (Indic::RPHF));
1487                                        break;
1488                                    case 'pref':
1489                                        $mask = (1 << (Indic::PREF));
1490                                        break;
1491                                    case 'blwf':
1492                                        $mask = (1 << (Indic::BLWF));
1493                                        break;
1494                                    case 'half':
1495                                        $mask = (1 << (Indic::HALF));
1496                                        break;
1497                                    case 'pstf':
1498                                        $mask = (1 << (Indic::PSTF));
1499                                        break;
1500                                    case 'cfar':
1501                                        $mask = (1 << (Indic::CFAR));
1502                                        break;
1503                                    case 'init':
1504                                        $mask = (1 << (Indic::INIT));
1505                                        break;
1506                                }
1507                                if (!($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['mask'] & $mask)) {
1508                                    continue;
1509                                }
1510                            }
1511                            // Get rules from font GSUB subtable
1512                            $shift = $this->_applyGSUBsubtable($lu, $c, $ptr, $currGlyph, $currGID, ($subtable_offset - $this->GSUB_offset), $Type, $Flag, $MarkFilteringSet, $this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$c], 0, $usetag, $is_old_spec, $tagInt);
1513
1514                            if ($shift) {
1515                                break;
1516                            }
1517                        } // Special case for Indic  ZZZ99S
1518                        // Check to substitute Halant-Consonant in PREF, BLWF or PSTF
1519                        // i.e. new spec but GSUB tables have Consonant-Halant in Lookups e.g. FreeSerif, which
1520                        // incorrectly just moved old spec tables to new spec. Uniscribe seems to cope with this
1521                        // See also ttffontsuni.php
1522                        // First check if current glyph is a Halant/Virama
1523                        elseif (static::_OTL_OLD_SPEC_COMPAT_1 && $Type == 4 && !$is_old_spec && strpos('0094D 009CD 00A4D 00ACD 00B4D 00BCD 00C4D 00CCD 00D4D', $currGlyph) !== false) {
1524                            // only apply when 'pref blwf pstf' tags, and when mask indicates
1525                            if (strpos('pref blwf pstf', $usetag) !== false) {
1526                                $mask = 0;
1527                                switch ($usetag) {
1528                                    case 'pref':
1529                                        $mask = (1 << (Indic::PREF));
1530                                        break;
1531                                    case 'blwf':
1532                                        $mask = (1 << (Indic::BLWF));
1533                                        break;
1534                                    case 'pstf':
1535                                        $mask = (1 << (Indic::PSTF));
1536                                        break;
1537                                }
1538                                if (!($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['mask'] & $mask)) {
1539                                    continue;
1540                                }
1541
1542                                if (!isset($this->OTLdata[$ptr + 1])) {
1543                                    continue;
1544                                }
1545
1546                                $nextGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$ptr + 1]['hex'];
1547                                $nextGID = $this->OTLdata[$ptr + 1]['uni'];
1548                                if (isset($this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$c][$nextGID])) {
1549                                    // Get rules from font GSUB subtable
1550                                    $shift = $this->_applyGSUBsubtableSpecial($lu, $c, $ptr, $currGlyph, $currGID, $nextGlyph, $nextGID, ($subtable_offset - $this->GSUB_offset), $Type, $this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$c]);
1551
1552                                    if ($shift) {
1553                                        break;
1554                                    }
1555                                }
1556                            }
1557                        }
1558                    }
1559                    if ($shift == 0) {
1560                        $shift = 1;
1561                    }
1562                    $ptr += $shift;
1563                }
1564            }
1565        }
1566    }
1567
1568    function _applyGSUBsubtableSpecial($lookupID, $subtable, $ptr, $currGlyph, $currGID, $nextGlyph, $nextGID, $subtable_offset, $Type, $LuCoverage)
1569    {
1570
1571        // Special case for Indic
1572        // Check to substitute Halant-Consonant in PREF, BLWF or PSTF
1573        // i.e. new spec but GSUB tables have Consonant-Halant in Lookups e.g. FreeSerif, which
1574        // incorrectly just moved old spec tables to new spec. Uniscribe seems to cope with this
1575        // See also ttffontsuni.php
1576
1577        $this->seek($subtable_offset);
1578        $SubstFormat = $this->read_ushort();
1579
1580        // Subtable contains Consonant - Halant
1581        // Text string contains Halant ($CurrGlyph) - Consonant ($nextGlyph)
1582        // Halant has already been matched, and already checked that $nextGID is in Coverage table
1583        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1584        // Only does: LookupType 4: Ligature Substitution Subtable : n to 1
1585        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1586        $Coverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
1587        $NextGlyphPos = $LuCoverage[$nextGID];
1588        $LigSetCount = $this->read_short();
1589
1590        $this->skip($NextGlyphPos * 2);
1591        $LigSet = $subtable_offset + $this->read_short();
1592
1593        $this->seek($LigSet);
1594        $LigCount = $this->read_short();
1595        // LigatureSet i.e. all starting with the same Glyph $nextGlyph [Consonant]
1596        $LigatureOffset = [];
1597        for ($g = 0; $g < $LigCount; $g++) {
1598            $LigatureOffset[$g] = $LigSet + $this->read_ushort();
1599        }
1600        for ($g = 0; $g < $LigCount; $g++) {
1601            // Ligature tables
1602            $this->seek($LigatureOffset[$g]);
1603            $LigGlyph = $this->read_ushort();
1604            $substitute = $this->glyphToChar($LigGlyph);
1605            $CompCount = $this->read_ushort();
1606
1607            if ($CompCount != 2) {
1608                return 0;
1609            } // Only expecting to work with 2:1 (and no ignore characters in between)
1610
1611
1612            $gid = $this->read_ushort();
1613            $checkGlyph = $this->glyphToChar($gid); // Other component/input Glyphs starting at position 2 (arrayindex 1)
1614
1615            if ($currGID == $checkGlyph) {
1616                $match = true;
1617            } else {
1618                $match = false;
1619                break;
1620            }
1621
1622            $GlyphPos = [];
1623            $GlyphPos[] = $ptr;
1624            $GlyphPos[] = $ptr + 1;
1625
1626
1627            if ($match) {
1628                $shift = $this->GSUBsubstitute($ptr, $substitute, 4, $GlyphPos); // GlyphPos contains positions to set null
1629                if ($shift) {
1630                    return 1;
1631                }
1632            }
1633        }
1634        return 0;
1635    }
1636
1637    function _applyGSUBsubtable($lookupID, $subtable, $ptr, $currGlyph, $currGID, $subtable_offset, $Type, $Flag, $MarkFilteringSet, $LuCoverage, $level, $currentTag, $is_old_spec, $tagInt)
1638    {
1639        $ignore = $this->_getGCOMignoreString($Flag, $MarkFilteringSet);
1640
1641        // Lets start
1642        $this->seek($subtable_offset);
1643        $SubstFormat = $this->read_ushort();
1644
1645        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1646        // LookupType 1: Single Substitution Subtable : 1 to 1
1647        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1648        if ($Type == 1) {
1649            // Flag = Ignore
1650            if ($this->_checkGCOMignore($Flag, $currGlyph, $MarkFilteringSet)) {
1651                return 0;
1652            }
1653            $CoverageOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
1654            $GlyphPos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
1655            //===========
1656            // Format 1:
1657            //===========
1658            if ($SubstFormat == 1) { // Calculated output glyph indices
1659                $DeltaGlyphID = $this->read_short();
1660                $this->seek($CoverageOffset);
1661                $glyphs = $this->_getCoverageGID();
1662                $GlyphID = $glyphs[$GlyphPos] + $DeltaGlyphID;
1663            } //===========
1664            // Format 2:
1665            //===========
1666            elseif ($SubstFormat == 2) { // Specified output glyph indices
1667                $GlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
1668                $this->skip($GlyphPos * 2);
1669                $GlyphID = $this->read_ushort();
1670            }
1671
1672            $substitute = $this->glyphToChar($GlyphID);
1673            $shift = $this->GSUBsubstitute($ptr, $substitute, $Type);
1674            if ($this->debugOTL && $shift) {
1675                $this->_dumpproc('GSUB', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $SubstFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
1676            }
1677            if ($shift) {
1678                return 1;
1679            }
1680            return 0;
1681        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1682        // LookupType 2: Multiple Substitution Subtable : 1 to n
1683        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1684        elseif ($Type == 2) {
1685            // Flag = Ignore
1686            if ($this->_checkGCOMignore($Flag, $currGlyph, $MarkFilteringSet)) {
1687                return 0;
1688            }
1689            $Coverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
1690            $GlyphPos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
1691            $this->skip(2);
1692            $this->skip($GlyphPos * 2);
1693            $Sequences = $subtable_offset + $this->read_short();
1694
1695            $this->seek($Sequences);
1696            $GlyphCount = $this->read_short();
1697            $SubstituteGlyphs = [];
1698            for ($g = 0; $g < $GlyphCount; $g++) {
1699                $sgid = $this->read_ushort();
1700                $SubstituteGlyphs[] = $this->glyphToChar($sgid);
1701            }
1702
1703            $shift = $this->GSUBsubstitute($ptr, $SubstituteGlyphs, $Type);
1704            if ($this->debugOTL && $shift) {
1705                $this->_dumpproc('GSUB', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $SubstFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
1706            }
1707            if ($shift) {
1708                return $shift;
1709            }
1710            return 0;
1711        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1712        // LookupType 3: Alternate Forms : 1 to 1(n)
1713        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1714        elseif ($Type == 3) {
1715            // Flag = Ignore
1716            if ($this->_checkGCOMignore($Flag, $currGlyph, $MarkFilteringSet)) {
1717                return 0;
1718            }
1719            $Coverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
1720            $AlternateSetCount = $this->read_short();
1721            ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
1722            // Need to set alternate IF set by CSS3 font-feature for a tag
1723            // i.e. if this is 'salt' alternate may be set to 2
1724            // default value will be $alt=1 ( === index of 0 in list of alternates)
1725            $alt = 1; // $alt=1 points to Alternative[0]
1726            if ($tagInt > 1) {
1727                $alt = $tagInt;
1728            }
1729            ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
1730            if ($alt == 0) {
1731                return 0;
1732            } // If specified alternate not present, cancel [ or could default $alt = 1 ?]
1733
1734            $GlyphPos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
1735            $this->skip($GlyphPos * 2);
1736
1737            $AlternateSets = $subtable_offset + $this->read_short();
1738            $this->seek($AlternateSets);
1739
1740            $AlternateGlyphCount = $this->read_short();
1741            if ($alt > $AlternateGlyphCount) {
1742                return 0;
1743            } // If specified alternate not present, cancel [ or could default $alt = 1 ?]
1744
1745            $this->skip(($alt - 1) * 2);
1746            $GlyphID = $this->read_ushort();
1747
1748            $substitute = $this->glyphToChar($GlyphID);
1749            $shift = $this->GSUBsubstitute($ptr, $substitute, $Type);
1750            if ($this->debugOTL && $shift) {
1751                $this->_dumpproc('GSUB', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $SubstFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
1752            }
1753            if ($shift) {
1754                return 1;
1755            }
1756            return 0;
1757        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1758        // LookupType 4: Ligature Substitution Subtable : n to 1
1759        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1760        elseif ($Type == 4) {
1761            // Flag = Ignore
1762            if ($this->_checkGCOMignore($Flag, $currGlyph, $MarkFilteringSet)) {
1763                return 0;
1764            }
1765            $Coverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
1766            $FirstGlyphPos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
1767
1768            $LigSetCount = $this->read_short();
1769
1770            $this->skip($FirstGlyphPos * 2);
1771            $LigSet = $subtable_offset + $this->read_short();
1772
1773            $this->seek($LigSet);
1774            $LigCount = $this->read_short();
1775            // LigatureSet i.e. all starting with the same first Glyph $currGlyph
1776            $LigatureOffset = [];
1777            for ($g = 0; $g < $LigCount; $g++) {
1778                $LigatureOffset[$g] = $LigSet + $this->read_ushort();
1779            }
1780            for ($g = 0; $g < $LigCount; $g++) {
1781                // Ligature tables
1782                $this->seek($LigatureOffset[$g]);
1783                $LigGlyph = $this->read_ushort(); // Output Ligature GlyphID
1784                $substitute = $this->glyphToChar($LigGlyph);
1785                $CompCount = $this->read_ushort();
1786
1787                $spos = $ptr;
1788                $match = true;
1789                $GlyphPos = [];
1790                $GlyphPos[] = $spos;
1791                for ($l = 1; $l < $CompCount; $l++) {
1792                    $gid = $this->read_ushort();
1793                    $checkGlyph = $this->glyphToChar($gid); // Other component/input Glyphs starting at position 2 (arrayindex 1)
1794
1795                    $spos++;
1796                    //while $this->OTLdata[$spos]['uni'] is an "ignore" =>  spos++
1797                    while (isset($this->OTLdata[$spos]) && strpos($ignore, $this->OTLdata[$spos]['hex']) !== false) {
1798                        $spos++;
1799                    }
1800
1801                    if (isset($this->OTLdata[$spos]) && $this->OTLdata[$spos]['uni'] == $checkGlyph) {
1802                        $GlyphPos[] = $spos;
1803                    } else {
1804                        $match = false;
1805                        break;
1806                    }
1807                }
1808
1809
1810                if ($match) {
1811                    $shift = $this->GSUBsubstitute($ptr, $substitute, $Type, $GlyphPos); // GlyphPos contains positions to set null
1812                    if ($this->debugOTL && $shift) {
1813                        $this->_dumpproc('GSUB', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $SubstFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
1814                    }
1815                    if ($shift) {
1816                        return ($spos - $ptr + 1 - ($CompCount - 1));
1817                    }
1818                }
1819            }
1820            return 0;
1821        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1822        // LookupType 5: Contextual Substitution Subtable
1823        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1824        elseif ($Type == 5) {
1825            //===========
1826            // Format 1: Simple Context Glyph Substitution
1827            //===========
1828            if ($SubstFormat == 1) {
1829                $CoverageTableOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
1830                $SubRuleSetCount = $this->read_ushort();
1831                $SubRuleSetOffset = [];
1832                for ($b = 0; $b < $SubRuleSetCount; $b++) {
1833                    $offset = $this->read_ushort();
1834                    if ($offset == 0x0000) {
1835                        $SubRuleSetOffset[] = $offset;
1836                    } else {
1837                        $SubRuleSetOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $offset;
1838                    }
1839                }
1840
1841                // SubRuleSet tables: All contexts beginning with the same glyph
1842                // Select the SubRuleSet required using the position of the glyph in the coverage table
1843                $GlyphPos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
1844                if ($SubRuleSetOffset[$GlyphPos] > 0) {
1845                    $this->seek($SubRuleSetOffset[$GlyphPos]);
1846                    $SubRuleCnt = $this->read_ushort();
1847                    $SubRule = [];
1848                    for ($b = 0; $b < $SubRuleCnt; $b++) {
1849                        $SubRule[$b] = $SubRuleSetOffset[$GlyphPos] + $this->read_ushort();
1850                    }
1851                    for ($b = 0; $b < $SubRuleCnt; $b++) {  // EACH RULE
1852                        $this->seek($SubRule[$b]);
1853                        $InputGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
1854                        $SubstCount = $this->read_ushort();
1855
1856                        $Backtrack = [];
1857                        $Lookahead = [];
1858                        $Input = [];
1859                        $Input[0] = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'];
1860                        for ($r = 1; $r < $InputGlyphCount; $r++) {
1861                            $gid = $this->read_ushort();
1862                            $Input[$r] = $this->glyphToChar($gid);
1863                        }
1864                        $matched = $this->checkContextMatch($Input, $Backtrack, $Lookahead, $ignore, $ptr);
1865                        if ($matched) {
1866                            if ($this->debugOTL) {
1867                                $this->_dumpproc('GSUB', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $SubstFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
1868                            }
1869                            for ($p = 0; $p < $SubstCount; $p++) { // EACH LOOKUP
1870                                $SequenceIndex[$p] = $this->read_ushort();
1871                                $LookupListIndex[$p] = $this->read_ushort();
1872                            }
1873
1874                            for ($p = 0; $p < $SubstCount; $p++) {
1875                                // Apply  $LookupListIndex  at   $SequenceIndex
1876                                if ($SequenceIndex[$p] >= $InputGlyphCount) {
1877                                    continue;
1878                                }
1879                                $lu = $LookupListIndex[$p];
1880                                $luType = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Type'];
1881                                $luFlag = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Flag'];
1882                                $luMarkFilteringSet = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'];
1883
1884                                $luptr = $matched[$SequenceIndex[$p]];
1885                                $lucurrGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['hex'];
1886                                $lucurrGID = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['uni'];
1887
1888                                foreach ($this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Subtables'] as $luc => $lusubtable_offset) {
1889                                    $shift = $this->_applyGSUBsubtable($lu, $luc, $luptr, $lucurrGlyph, $lucurrGID, ($lusubtable_offset - $this->GSUB_offset), $luType, $luFlag, $luMarkFilteringSet, $this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$luc], 1, $currentTag, $is_old_spec, $tagInt);
1890                                    if ($shift) {
1891                                        break;
1892                                    }
1893                                }
1894                            }
1895
1896                            if (!defined("OMIT_OTL_FIX_3") || OMIT_OTL_FIX_3 != 1) {
1897                                return $shift;
1898                            } /* OTL_FIX_3 */
1899                            else {
1900                                return $InputGlyphCount; // should be + matched ignores in Input Sequence
1901                            }
1902                        }
1903                    }
1904                }
1905                return 0;
1906            } //===========
1907            // Format 2:
1908            //===========
1909            // Format 2: Class-based Context Glyph Substitution
1910            elseif ($SubstFormat == 2) {
1911                $CoverageTableOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
1912                $InputClassDefOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
1913                $SubClassSetCnt = $this->read_ushort();
1914                $SubClassSetOffset = [];
1915                for ($b = 0; $b < $SubClassSetCnt; $b++) {
1916                    $offset = $this->read_ushort();
1917                    if ($offset == 0x0000) {
1918                        $SubClassSetOffset[] = $offset;
1919                    } else {
1920                        $SubClassSetOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $offset;
1921                    }
1922                }
1923
1924                $InputClasses = $this->_getClasses($InputClassDefOffset);
1925
1926                for ($s = 0; $s < $SubClassSetCnt; $s++) { // $SubClassSet is ordered by input class-may be NULL
1927                    // Select $SubClassSet if currGlyph is in First Input Class
1928                    if ($SubClassSetOffset[$s] > 0 && isset($InputClasses[$s][$currGID])) {
1929                        $this->seek($SubClassSetOffset[$s]);
1930                        $SubClassRuleCnt = $this->read_ushort();
1931                        $SubClassRule = [];
1932                        for ($b = 0; $b < $SubClassRuleCnt; $b++) {
1933                            $SubClassRule[$b] = $SubClassSetOffset[$s] + $this->read_ushort();
1934                        }
1935
1936                        for ($b = 0; $b < $SubClassRuleCnt; $b++) {  // EACH RULE
1937                            $this->seek($SubClassRule[$b]);
1938                            $InputGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
1939                            $SubstCount = $this->read_ushort();
1940                            $Input = [];
1941                            for ($r = 1; $r < $InputGlyphCount; $r++) {
1942                                $Input[$r] = $this->read_ushort();
1943                            }
1944
1945                            $inputClass = $s;
1946
1947                            $inputGlyphs = [];
1948                            $inputGlyphs[0] = $InputClasses[$inputClass];
1949
1950                            if ($InputGlyphCount > 1) {
1951                                //  NB starts at 1
1952                                for ($gcl = 1; $gcl < $InputGlyphCount; $gcl++) {
1953                                    $classindex = $Input[$gcl];
1954                                    if (isset($InputClasses[$classindex])) {
1955                                        $inputGlyphs[$gcl] = $InputClasses[$classindex];
1956                                    } else {
1957                                        $inputGlyphs[$gcl] = '';
1958                                    }
1959                                }
1960                            }
1961
1962                            // Class 0 contains all the glyphs NOT in the other classes
1963                            $class0excl = [];
1964                            for ($gc = 1; $gc <= count($InputClasses); $gc++) {
1965                                if (is_array($InputClasses[$gc])) {
1966                                    $class0excl = $class0excl + $InputClasses[$gc];
1967                                }
1968                            }
1969
1970                            $backtrackGlyphs = [];
1971                            $lookaheadGlyphs = [];
1972
1973                            $matched = $this->checkContextMatchMultipleUni($inputGlyphs, $backtrackGlyphs, $lookaheadGlyphs, $ignore, $ptr, $class0excl);
1974                            if ($matched) {
1975                                if ($this->debugOTL) {
1976                                    $this->_dumpproc('GSUB', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $SubstFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
1977                                }
1978                                for ($p = 0; $p < $SubstCount; $p++) { // EACH LOOKUP
1979                                    $SequenceIndex[$p] = $this->read_ushort();
1980                                    $LookupListIndex[$p] = $this->read_ushort();
1981                                }
1982
1983                                for ($p = 0; $p < $SubstCount; $p++) {
1984                                    // Apply  $LookupListIndex  at   $SequenceIndex
1985                                    if ($SequenceIndex[$p] >= $InputGlyphCount) {
1986                                        continue;
1987                                    }
1988                                    $lu = $LookupListIndex[$p];
1989                                    $luType = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Type'];
1990                                    $luFlag = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Flag'];
1991                                    $luMarkFilteringSet = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'];
1992
1993                                    $luptr = $matched[$SequenceIndex[$p]];
1994                                    $lucurrGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['hex'];
1995                                    $lucurrGID = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['uni'];
1996
1997                                    foreach ($this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Subtables'] as $luc => $lusubtable_offset) {
1998                                        $shift = $this->_applyGSUBsubtable($lu, $luc, $luptr, $lucurrGlyph, $lucurrGID, ($lusubtable_offset - $this->GSUB_offset), $luType, $luFlag, $luMarkFilteringSet, $this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$luc], 1, $currentTag, $is_old_spec, $tagInt);
1999                                        if ($shift) {
2000                                            break;
2001                                        }
2002                                    }
2003                                }
2004
2005                                if (!defined("OMIT_OTL_FIX_3") || OMIT_OTL_FIX_3 != 1) {
2006                                    return $shift;
2007                                } /* OTL_FIX_3 */
2008                                else {
2009                                    return $InputGlyphCount; // should be + matched ignores in Input Sequence
2010                                }
2011                            }
2012                        }
2013                    }
2014                }
2015
2016                return 0;
2017            } //===========
2018            // Format 3:
2019            //===========
2020            // Format 3: Coverage-based Context Glyph Substitution
2021            elseif ($SubstFormat == 3) {
2022                throw new \Mpdf\MpdfException("GSUB Lookup Type " . $Type . " Format " . $SubstFormat . " not TESTED YET.");
2023            }
2024        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2025        // LookupType 6: Chaining Contextual Substitution Subtable
2026        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2027        elseif ($Type == 6) {
2028            //===========
2029            // Format 1:
2030            //===========
2031            // Format 1: Simple Chaining Context Glyph Substitution
2032            if ($SubstFormat == 1) {
2033                $Coverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
2034                $GlyphPos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
2035                $ChainSubRuleSetCount = $this->read_ushort();
2036                // All of the ChainSubRule tables defining contexts that begin with the same first glyph are grouped together and defined in a ChainSubRuleSet table
2037                $this->skip($GlyphPos * 2);
2038                $ChainSubRuleSet = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
2039                $this->seek($ChainSubRuleSet);
2040                $ChainSubRuleCount = $this->read_ushort();
2041
2042                for ($s = 0; $s < $ChainSubRuleCount; $s++) {
2043                    $ChainSubRule[$s] = $ChainSubRuleSet + $this->read_ushort();
2044                }
2045
2046                for ($s = 0; $s < $ChainSubRuleCount; $s++) {
2047                    $this->seek($ChainSubRule[$s]);
2048
2049                    $BacktrackGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
2050                    $Backtrack = [];
2051                    for ($b = 0; $b < $BacktrackGlyphCount; $b++) {
2052                        $gid = $this->read_ushort();
2053                        $Backtrack[] = $this->glyphToChar($gid);
2054                    }
2055                    $Input = [];
2056                    $Input[0] = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'];
2057                    $InputGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
2058                    for ($b = 1; $b < $InputGlyphCount; $b++) {
2059                        $gid = $this->read_ushort();
2060                        $Input[$b] = $this->glyphToChar($gid);
2061                    }
2062                    $LookaheadGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
2063                    $Lookahead = [];
2064                    for ($b = 0; $b < $LookaheadGlyphCount; $b++) {
2065                        $gid = $this->read_ushort();
2066                        $Lookahead[] = $this->glyphToChar($gid);
2067                    }
2068
2069                    $matched = $this->checkContextMatch($Input, $Backtrack, $Lookahead, $ignore, $ptr);
2070                    if ($matched) {
2071                        if ($this->debugOTL) {
2072                            $this->_dumpproc('GSUB', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $SubstFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
2073                        }
2074                        $SubstCount = $this->read_ushort();
2075                        for ($p = 0; $p < $SubstCount; $p++) {
2076                            // SubstLookupRecord
2077                            $SubstLookupRecord[$p]['SequenceIndex'] = $this->read_ushort();
2078                            $SubstLookupRecord[$p]['LookupListIndex'] = $this->read_ushort();
2079                        }
2080                        for ($p = 0; $p < $SubstCount; $p++) {
2081                            // Apply  $SubstLookupRecord[$p]['LookupListIndex']  at   $SubstLookupRecord[$p]['SequenceIndex']
2082                            if ($SubstLookupRecord[$p]['SequenceIndex'] >= $InputGlyphCount) {
2083                                continue;
2084                            }
2085                            $lu = $SubstLookupRecord[$p]['LookupListIndex'];
2086                            $luType = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Type'];
2087                            $luFlag = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Flag'];
2088                            $luMarkFilteringSet = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'];
2089
2090                            $luptr = $matched[$SubstLookupRecord[$p]['SequenceIndex']];
2091                            $lucurrGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['hex'];
2092                            $lucurrGID = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['uni'];
2093
2094                            foreach ($this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Subtables'] as $luc => $lusubtable_offset) {
2095                                $shift = $this->_applyGSUBsubtable($lu, $luc, $luptr, $lucurrGlyph, $lucurrGID, ($lusubtable_offset - $this->GSUB_offset), $luType, $luFlag, $luMarkFilteringSet, $this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$luc], 1, $currentTag, $is_old_spec, $tagInt);
2096                                if ($shift) {
2097                                    break;
2098                                }
2099                            }
2100                        }
2101                        if (!defined("OMIT_OTL_FIX_3") || OMIT_OTL_FIX_3 != 1) {
2102                            return $shift;
2103                        } /* OTL_FIX_3 */
2104                        else {
2105                            return $InputGlyphCount; // should be + matched ignores in Input Sequence
2106                        }
2107                    }
2108                }
2109                return 0;
2110            } //===========
2111            // Format 2:
2112            //===========
2113            // Format 2: Class-based Chaining Context Glyph Substitution  p257
2114            elseif ($SubstFormat == 2) {
2115                // NB Format 2 specifies fixed class assignments (identical for each position in the backtrack, input, or lookahead sequence) and exclusive classes (a glyph cannot be in more than one class at a time)
2116
2117                $CoverageTableOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
2118                $BacktrackClassDefOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
2119                $InputClassDefOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
2120                $LookaheadClassDefOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
2121                $ChainSubClassSetCnt = $this->read_ushort();
2122                $ChainSubClassSetOffset = [];
2123                for ($b = 0; $b < $ChainSubClassSetCnt; $b++) {
2124                    $offset = $this->read_ushort();
2125                    if ($offset == 0x0000) {
2126                        $ChainSubClassSetOffset[] = $offset;
2127                    } else {
2128                        $ChainSubClassSetOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $offset;
2129                    }
2130                }
2131
2132                $BacktrackClasses = $this->_getClasses($BacktrackClassDefOffset);
2133                $InputClasses = $this->_getClasses($InputClassDefOffset);
2134                $LookaheadClasses = $this->_getClasses($LookaheadClassDefOffset);
2135
2136                for ($s = 0; $s < $ChainSubClassSetCnt; $s++) { // $ChainSubClassSet is ordered by input class-may be NULL
2137                    // Select $ChainSubClassSet if currGlyph is in First Input Class
2138                    if ($ChainSubClassSetOffset[$s] > 0 && isset($InputClasses[$s][$currGID])) {
2139                        $this->seek($ChainSubClassSetOffset[$s]);
2140                        $ChainSubClassRuleCnt = $this->read_ushort();
2141                        $ChainSubClassRule = [];
2142                        for ($b = 0; $b < $ChainSubClassRuleCnt; $b++) {
2143                            $ChainSubClassRule[$b] = $ChainSubClassSetOffset[$s] + $this->read_ushort();
2144                        }
2145
2146                        for ($b = 0; $b < $ChainSubClassRuleCnt; $b++) {  // EACH RULE
2147                            $this->seek($ChainSubClassRule[$b]);
2148                            $BacktrackGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
2149                            for ($r = 0; $r < $BacktrackGlyphCount; $r++) {
2150                                $Backtrack[$r] = $this->read_ushort();
2151                            }
2152                            $InputGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
2153                            for ($r = 1; $r < $InputGlyphCount; $r++) {
2154                                $Input[$r] = $this->read_ushort();
2155                            }
2156                            $LookaheadGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
2157                            for ($r = 0; $r < $LookaheadGlyphCount; $r++) {
2158                                $Lookahead[$r] = $this->read_ushort();
2159                            }
2160
2161
2162                            // These contain classes of glyphs as arrays
2163                            // $InputClasses[(class)] e.g. 0x02E6,0x02E7,0x02E8
2164                            // $LookaheadClasses[(class)]
2165                            // $BacktrackClasses[(class)]
2166                            // These contain arrays of classIndexes
2167                            // [Backtrack] [Lookahead] and [Input] (Input is from the second position only)
2168
2169
2170                            $inputClass = $s; //???
2171
2172                            $inputGlyphs = [];
2173                            $inputGlyphs[0] = $InputClasses[$inputClass];
2174
2175                            if ($InputGlyphCount > 1) {
2176                                //  NB starts at 1
2177                                for ($gcl = 1; $gcl < $InputGlyphCount; $gcl++) {
2178                                    $classindex = $Input[$gcl];
2179                                    if (isset($InputClasses[$classindex])) {
2180                                        $inputGlyphs[$gcl] = $InputClasses[$classindex];
2181                                    } else {
2182                                        $inputGlyphs[$gcl] = '';
2183                                    }
2184                                }
2185                            }
2186
2187                            // Class 0 contains all the glyphs NOT in the other classes
2188                            $class0excl = [];
2189                            for ($gc = 1; $gc <= count($InputClasses); $gc++) {
2190                                if (isset($InputClasses[$gc])) {
2191                                    $class0excl = $class0excl + $InputClasses[$gc];
2192                                }
2193                            }
2194
2195                            if ($BacktrackGlyphCount) {
2196                                for ($gcl = 0; $gcl < $BacktrackGlyphCount; $gcl++) {
2197                                    $classindex = $Backtrack[$gcl];
2198                                    if (isset($BacktrackClasses[$classindex])) {
2199                                        $backtrackGlyphs[$gcl] = $BacktrackClasses[$classindex];
2200                                    } else {
2201                                        $backtrackGlyphs[$gcl] = '';
2202                                    }
2203                                }
2204                            } else {
2205                                $backtrackGlyphs = [];
2206                            }
2207
2208                            // Class 0 contains all the glyphs NOT in the other classes
2209                            $bclass0excl = [];
2210                            for ($gc = 1; $gc <= count($BacktrackClasses); $gc++) {
2211                                if (isset($BacktrackClasses[$gc])) {
2212                                    $bclass0excl = $bclass0excl + $BacktrackClasses[$gc];
2213                                }
2214                            }
2215
2216
2217                            if ($LookaheadGlyphCount) {
2218                                for ($gcl = 0; $gcl < $LookaheadGlyphCount; $gcl++) {
2219                                    $classindex = $Lookahead[$gcl];
2220                                    if (isset($LookaheadClasses[$classindex])) {
2221                                        $lookaheadGlyphs[$gcl] = $LookaheadClasses[$classindex];
2222                                    } else {
2223                                        $lookaheadGlyphs[$gcl] = '';
2224                                    }
2225                                }
2226                            } else {
2227                                $lookaheadGlyphs = [];
2228                            }
2229
2230                            // Class 0 contains all the glyphs NOT in the other classes
2231                            $lclass0excl = [];
2232                            for ($gc = 1; $gc <= count($LookaheadClasses); $gc++) {
2233                                if (isset($LookaheadClasses[$gc])) {
2234                                    $lclass0excl = $lclass0excl + $LookaheadClasses[$gc];
2235                                }
2236                            }
2237
2238
2239                            $matched = $this->checkContextMatchMultipleUni($inputGlyphs, $backtrackGlyphs, $lookaheadGlyphs, $ignore, $ptr, $class0excl, $bclass0excl, $lclass0excl);
2240                            if ($matched) {
2241                                if ($this->debugOTL) {
2242                                    $this->_dumpproc('GSUB', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $SubstFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
2243                                }
2244                                $SubstCount = $this->read_ushort();
2245                                for ($p = 0; $p < $SubstCount; $p++) { // EACH LOOKUP
2246                                    $SequenceIndex[$p] = $this->read_ushort();
2247                                    $LookupListIndex[$p] = $this->read_ushort();
2248                                }
2249
2250                                for ($p = 0; $p < $SubstCount; $p++) {
2251                                    // Apply  $LookupListIndex  at   $SequenceIndex
2252                                    if ($SequenceIndex[$p] >= $InputGlyphCount) {
2253                                        continue;
2254                                    }
2255                                    $lu = $LookupListIndex[$p];
2256                                    $luType = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Type'];
2257                                    $luFlag = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Flag'];
2258                                    $luMarkFilteringSet = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'];
2259
2260                                    $luptr = $matched[$SequenceIndex[$p]];
2261                                    $lucurrGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['hex'];
2262                                    $lucurrGID = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['uni'];
2263
2264                                    foreach ($this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Subtables'] as $luc => $lusubtable_offset) {
2265                                        $shift = $this->_applyGSUBsubtable($lu, $luc, $luptr, $lucurrGlyph, $lucurrGID, ($lusubtable_offset - $this->GSUB_offset), $luType, $luFlag, $luMarkFilteringSet, $this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$luc], 1, $currentTag, $is_old_spec, $tagInt);
2266                                        if ($shift) {
2267                                            break;
2268                                        }
2269                                    }
2270                                }
2271
2272                                if (!defined("OMIT_OTL_FIX_3") || OMIT_OTL_FIX_3 != 1) {
2273                                    return $shift;
2274                                } /* OTL_FIX_3 */
2275                                else {
2276                                    return $InputGlyphCount; // should be + matched ignores in Input Sequence
2277                                }
2278                            }
2279                        }
2280                    }
2281                }
2282
2283                return 0;
2284            } //===========
2285            // Format 3:
2286            //===========
2287            // Format 3: Coverage-based Chaining Context Glyph Substitution  p259
2288            elseif ($SubstFormat == 3) {
2289                $BacktrackGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
2290                for ($b = 0; $b < $BacktrackGlyphCount; $b++) {
2291                    $CoverageBacktrackOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // in glyph sequence order
2292                }
2293                $InputGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
2294                for ($b = 0; $b < $InputGlyphCount; $b++) {
2295                    $CoverageInputOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // in glyph sequence order
2296                }
2297                $LookaheadGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
2298                for ($b = 0; $b < $LookaheadGlyphCount; $b++) {
2299                    $CoverageLookaheadOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // in glyph sequence order
2300                }
2301                $SubstCount = $this->read_ushort();
2302                $save_pos = $this->_pos; // Save the point just after PosCount
2303
2304                $CoverageBacktrackGlyphs = [];
2305                for ($b = 0; $b < $BacktrackGlyphCount; $b++) {
2306                    $this->seek($CoverageBacktrackOffset[$b]);
2307                    $glyphs = $this->_getCoverage();
2308                    $CoverageBacktrackGlyphs[$b] = implode("|", $glyphs);
2309                }
2310                $CoverageInputGlyphs = [];
2311                for ($b = 0; $b < $InputGlyphCount; $b++) {
2312                    $this->seek($CoverageInputOffset[$b]);
2313                    $glyphs = $this->_getCoverage();
2314                    $CoverageInputGlyphs[$b] = implode("|", $glyphs);
2315                }
2316                $CoverageLookaheadGlyphs = [];
2317                for ($b = 0; $b < $LookaheadGlyphCount; $b++) {
2318                    $this->seek($CoverageLookaheadOffset[$b]);
2319                    $glyphs = $this->_getCoverage();
2320                    $CoverageLookaheadGlyphs[$b] = implode("|", $glyphs);
2321                }
2322
2323                $matched = $this->checkContextMatchMultiple($CoverageInputGlyphs, $CoverageBacktrackGlyphs, $CoverageLookaheadGlyphs, $ignore, $ptr);
2324                if ($matched) {
2325                    if ($this->debugOTL) {
2326                        $this->_dumpproc('GSUB', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $SubstFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
2327                    }
2328
2329                    $this->seek($save_pos); // Return to just after PosCount
2330                    for ($p = 0; $p < $SubstCount; $p++) {
2331                        // SubstLookupRecord
2332                        $SubstLookupRecord[$p]['SequenceIndex'] = $this->read_ushort();
2333                        $SubstLookupRecord[$p]['LookupListIndex'] = $this->read_ushort();
2334                    }
2335                    for ($p = 0; $p < $SubstCount; $p++) {
2336                        // Apply  $SubstLookupRecord[$p]['LookupListIndex']  at   $SubstLookupRecord[$p]['SequenceIndex']
2337                        if ($SubstLookupRecord[$p]['SequenceIndex'] >= $InputGlyphCount) {
2338                            continue;
2339                        }
2340                        $lu = $SubstLookupRecord[$p]['LookupListIndex'];
2341                        $luType = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Type'];
2342                        $luFlag = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Flag'];
2343                        $luMarkFilteringSet = $this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'];
2344
2345                        $luptr = $matched[$SubstLookupRecord[$p]['SequenceIndex']];
2346                        $lucurrGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['hex'];
2347                        $lucurrGID = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['uni'];
2348
2349                        foreach ($this->GSUBLookups[$lu]['Subtables'] as $luc => $lusubtable_offset) {
2350                            $shift = $this->_applyGSUBsubtable($lu, $luc, $luptr, $lucurrGlyph, $lucurrGID, ($lusubtable_offset - $this->GSUB_offset), $luType, $luFlag, $luMarkFilteringSet, $this->GSLuCoverage[$lu][$luc], 1, $currentTag, $is_old_spec, $tagInt);
2351                            if ($shift) {
2352                                break;
2353                            }
2354                        }
2355                    }
2356                    if (!defined("OMIT_OTL_FIX_3") || OMIT_OTL_FIX_3 != 1) {
2357                        return (isset($shift) ? $shift : 0);
2358                    } /* OTL_FIX_3 */
2359                    else {
2360                        return $InputGlyphCount; // should be + matched ignores in Input Sequence
2361                    }
2362                }
2363
2364                return 0;
2365            }
2366        } else {
2367            throw new \Mpdf\MpdfException("GSUB Lookup Type " . $Type . " not supported.");
2368        }
2369    }
2370
2371    function _updateLigatureMarks($pos, $n)
2372    {
2373        if ($n > 0) {
2374            // Update position of Ligatures and associated Marks
2375            // Foreach lig/assocMarks
2376            // Any position lpos or mpos > $pos + count($substitute)
2377            //  $this->assocMarks = array();    // assocMarks[$pos mpos] => array(compID, ligPos)
2378            //  $this->assocLigs = array(); // Ligatures[$pos lpos] => nc
2379            for ($p = count($this->OTLdata) - 1; $p >= ($pos + $n); $p--) {
2380                if (isset($this->assocLigs[$p])) {
2381                    $tmp = $this->assocLigs[$p];
2382                    unset($this->assocLigs[$p]);
2383                    $this->assocLigs[($p + $n)] = $tmp;
2384                }
2385            }
2386            for ($p = count($this->OTLdata) - 1; $p >= 0; $p--) {
2387                if (isset($this->assocMarks[$p])) {
2388                    if ($this->assocMarks[$p]['ligPos'] >= ($pos + $n)) {
2389                        $this->assocMarks[$p]['ligPos'] += $n;
2390                    }
2391                    if ($p >= ($pos + $n)) {
2392                        $tmp = $this->assocMarks[$p];
2393                        unset($this->assocMarks[$p]);
2394                        $this->assocMarks[($p + $n)] = $tmp;
2395                    }
2396                }
2397            }
2398        } elseif ($n < 1) { // glyphs removed
2399            $nrem = -$n;
2400            // Update position of pre-existing Ligatures and associated Marks
2401            for ($p = ($pos + 1); $p < count($this->OTLdata); $p++) {
2402                if (isset($this->assocLigs[$p])) {
2403                    $tmp = $this->assocLigs[$p];
2404                    unset($this->assocLigs[$p]);
2405                    $this->assocLigs[($p - $nrem)] = $tmp;
2406                }
2407            }
2408            for ($p = 0; $p < count($this->OTLdata); $p++) {
2409                if (isset($this->assocMarks[$p])) {
2410                    if ($this->assocMarks[$p]['ligPos'] >= ($pos)) {
2411                        $this->assocMarks[$p]['ligPos'] -= $nrem;
2412                    }
2413                    if ($p > $pos) {
2414                        $tmp = $this->assocMarks[$p];
2415                        unset($this->assocMarks[$p]);
2416                        $this->assocMarks[($p - $nrem)] = $tmp;
2417                    }
2418                }
2419            }
2420        }
2421    }
2422
2423    function GSUBsubstitute($pos, $substitute, $Type, $GlyphPos = null)
2424    {
2425
2426        // LookupType 1: Simple Substitution Subtable : 1 to 1
2427        // LookupType 3: Alternate Forms : 1 to 1(n)
2428        if ($Type == 1 || $Type == 3) {
2429            $this->OTLdata[$pos]['uni'] = $substitute;
2430            $this->OTLdata[$pos]['hex'] = $this->unicode_hex($substitute);
2431            return 1;
2432        } // LookupType 2: Multiple Substitution Subtable : 1 to n
2433        elseif ($Type == 2) {
2434            for ($i = 0; $i < count($substitute); $i++) {
2435                $uni = $substitute[$i];
2436                $newOTLdata[$i] = [];
2437                $newOTLdata[$i]['uni'] = $uni;
2438                $newOTLdata[$i]['hex'] = $this->unicode_hex($uni);
2439
2440
2441                // Get types of new inserted chars - or replicate type of char being replaced
2442                //  $bt = Ucdn::get_bidi_class($uni);
2443                //  if (!$bt) {
2444                $bt = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['bidi_type'];
2445                //  }
2446
2447                if (strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $newOTLdata[$i]['hex']) !== false) {
2448                    $gp = 'M';
2449                } elseif ($uni == 32) {
2450                    $gp = 'S';
2451                } else {
2452                    $gp = 'C';
2453                }
2454
2455                // Need to update matra_type ??? of new glyphs inserted ???????????????????????????????????????
2456
2457                $newOTLdata[$i]['bidi_type'] = $bt;
2458                $newOTLdata[$i]['group'] = $gp;
2459
2460                // Need to update details of new glyphs inserted
2461                $newOTLdata[$i]['general_category'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['general_category'];
2462
2463                if ($this->shaper == 'I' || $this->shaper == 'K' || $this->shaper == 'S') {
2464                    $newOTLdata[$i]['indic_category'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['indic_category'];
2465                    $newOTLdata[$i]['indic_position'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['indic_position'];
2466                } elseif ($this->shaper == 'M') {
2467                    $newOTLdata[$i]['myanmar_category'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['myanmar_category'];
2468                    $newOTLdata[$i]['myanmar_position'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['myanmar_position'];
2469                }
2470                if (isset($this->OTLdata[$pos]['mask'])) {
2471                    $newOTLdata[$i]['mask'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['mask'];
2472                }
2473                if (isset($this->OTLdata[$pos]['syllable'])) {
2474                    $newOTLdata[$i]['syllable'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['syllable'];
2475                }
2476            }
2477            if ($this->shaper == 'K' || $this->shaper == 'T' || $this->shaper == 'L') {
2478                if ($this->OTLdata[$pos]['wordend']) {
2479                    $newOTLdata[count($substitute) - 1]['wordend'] = true;
2480                }
2481            }
2482
2483            array_splice($this->OTLdata, $pos, 1, $newOTLdata); // Replace 1 with n
2484            // Update position of Ligatures and associated Marks
2485            // count($substitute)-1  is the number of glyphs added
2486            $nadd = count($substitute) - 1;
2487            $this->_updateLigatureMarks($pos, $nadd);
2488            return count($substitute);
2489        } // LookupType 4: Ligature Substitution Subtable : n to 1
2490        elseif ($Type == 4) {
2491            // Create Ligatures and associated Marks
2492            $firstGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['hex'];
2493
2494            // If all components of the ligature are marks (and in the same syllable), we call this a mark ligature.
2495            $contains_marks = false;
2496            $contains_nonmarks = false;
2497            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$pos]['syllable'])) {
2498                $current_syllable = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['syllable'];
2499            } else {
2500                $current_syllable = 0;
2501            }
2502            for ($i = 0; $i < count($GlyphPos); $i++) {
2503                // If subsequent components are not Marks as well - don't ligate
2504                $unistr = $this->OTLdata[$GlyphPos[$i]]['hex'];
2505                if ($this->restrictToSyllable && isset($this->OTLdata[$GlyphPos[$i]]['syllable']) && $this->OTLdata[$GlyphPos[$i]]['syllable'] != $current_syllable) {
2506                    return 0;
2507                }
2508                if (strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $unistr) !== false) {
2509                    $contains_marks = true;
2510                } else {
2511                    $contains_nonmarks = true;
2512                }
2513            }
2514            if ($contains_marks && !$contains_nonmarks) {
2515                // Mark Ligature (all components are Marks)
2516                $firstMarkAssoc = '';
2517                if (isset($this->assocMarks[$pos])) {
2518                    $firstMarkAssoc = $this->assocMarks[$pos];
2519                }
2520                // If all components of the ligature are marks, we call this a mark ligature.
2521                for ($i = 1; $i < count($GlyphPos); $i++) {
2522                    // If subsequent components are not Marks as well - don't ligate
2523                    //      $unistr = $this->OTLdata[$GlyphPos[$i]]['hex'];
2524                    //      if (strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $unistr )===false) { return; }
2525
2526                    $nextMarkAssoc = '';
2527                    if (isset($this->assocMarks[$GlyphPos[$i]])) {
2528                        $nextMarkAssoc = $this->assocMarks[$GlyphPos[$i]];
2529                    }
2530                    // If first component was attached to a previous ligature component,
2531                    // all subsequent components should be attached to the same ligature
2532                    // component, otherwise we shouldn't ligate them.
2533                    // If first component was NOT attached to a previous ligature component,
2534                    // all subsequent components should also NOT be attached to any ligature component,
2535                    if ($firstMarkAssoc != $nextMarkAssoc) {
2536                        // unless they are attached to the first component itself!
2537                        //          if (!is_array($nextMarkAssoc) || $nextMarkAssoc['ligPos']!= $pos) { return; }
2538                        // Update/Edit - In test with myanmartext font
2539                        // &#x1004;&#x103a;&#x1039;&#x1000;&#x1039;&#x1000;&#x103b;&#x103c;&#x103d;&#x1031;&#x102d;
2540                        // => Lookup 17  E003 E066B E05A 102D
2541                        // E003 and 102D should form a mark ligature, but 102D is already associated with (non-mark) ligature E05A
2542                        // So instead of disallowing the mark ligature to form, just dissociate...
2543                        if (!is_array($nextMarkAssoc) || $nextMarkAssoc['ligPos'] != $pos) {
2544                            unset($this->assocMarks[$GlyphPos[$i]]);
2545                        }
2546                    }
2547                }
2548
2549                /*
2550                 * - If it *is* a mark ligature, we don't allocate a new ligature id, and leave
2551                 *   the ligature to keep its old ligature id.  This will allow it to attach to
2552                 *   a base ligature in GPOS.  Eg. if the sequence is: LAM,LAM,SHADDA,FATHA,HEH,
2553                 *   and LAM,LAM,HEH form a ligature, they will leave SHADDA and FATHA wit a
2554                 *   ligature id and component value of 2.  Then if SHADDA,FATHA form a ligature
2555                 *   later, we don't want them to lose their ligature id/component, otherwise
2556                 *   GPOS will fail to correctly position the mark ligature on top of the
2557                 *   LAM,LAM,HEH ligature.
2558                 */
2559                // So if is_array($firstMarkAssoc) - the new (Mark) ligature should keep this association
2560
2561                $lastPos = $GlyphPos[(count($GlyphPos) - 1)];
2562            } else {
2563                /*
2564                 * - Ligatures cannot be formed across glyphs attached to different components
2565                 *   of previous ligatures.  Eg. the sequence is LAM,SHADDA,LAM,FATHA,HEH, and
2566                 *   LAM,LAM,HEH form a ligature, leaving SHADDA,FATHA next to eachother.
2567                 *   However, it would be wrong to ligate that SHADDA,FATHA sequence.
2568                 *   There is an exception to this: If a ligature tries ligating with marks that
2569                 *   belong to it itself, go ahead, assuming that the font designer knows what
2570                 *   they are doing (otherwise it can break Indic stuff when a matra wants to
2571                 *   ligate with a conjunct...)
2572                 */
2573
2574                /*
2575                 * - If a ligature is formed of components that some of which are also ligatures
2576                 *   themselves, and those ligature components had marks attached to *their*
2577                 *   components, we have to attach the marks to the new ligature component
2578                 *   positions!  Now *that*'s tricky!  And these marks may be following the
2579                 *   last component of the whole sequence, so we should loop forward looking
2580                 *   for them and update them.
2581                 *
2582                 *   Eg. the sequence is LAM,LAM,SHADDA,FATHA,HEH, and the font first forms a
2583                 *   'calt' ligature of LAM,HEH, leaving the SHADDA and FATHA with a ligature
2584                 *   id and component == 1.  Now, during 'liga', the LAM and the LAM-HEH ligature
2585                 *   form a LAM-LAM-HEH ligature.  We need to reassign the SHADDA and FATHA to
2586                 *   the new ligature with a component value of 2.
2587                 *
2588                 *   This in fact happened to a font...  See:
2589                 *   https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=437633
2590                 */
2591
2592                $currComp = 0;
2593                for ($i = 0; $i < count($GlyphPos); $i++) {
2594                    if ($i > 0 && isset($this->assocLigs[$GlyphPos[$i]])) { // One of the other components is already a ligature
2595                        $nc = $this->assocLigs[$GlyphPos[$i]];
2596                    } else {
2597                        $nc = 1;
2598                    }
2599                    // While next char to right is a mark (but not the next matched glyph)
2600                    // ?? + also include a Mark Ligature here
2601                    $ic = 1;
2602                    while ((($i == count($GlyphPos) - 1) || (isset($GlyphPos[$i + 1]) && ($GlyphPos[$i] + $ic) < $GlyphPos[$i + 1])) && isset($this->OTLdata[($GlyphPos[$i] + $ic)]) && strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->OTLdata[($GlyphPos[$i] + $ic)]['hex']) !== false) {
2603                        $newComp = $currComp;
2604                        if (isset($this->assocMarks[$GlyphPos[$i] + $ic])) { // One of the inbetween Marks is already associated with a Lig
2605                            // OK as long as it is associated with the current Lig
2606                            //      if ($this->assocMarks[($GlyphPos[$i]+$ic)]['ligPos'] != ($GlyphPos[$i]+$ic)) { die("Problem #1"); }
2607                            $newComp += $this->assocMarks[($GlyphPos[$i] + $ic)]['compID'];
2608                        }
2609                        $this->assocMarks[($GlyphPos[$i] + $ic)] = ['compID' => $newComp, 'ligPos' => $pos];
2610                        $ic++;
2611                    }
2612                    $currComp += $nc;
2613                }
2614                $lastPos = $GlyphPos[(count($GlyphPos) - 1)] + $ic - 1;
2615                $this->assocLigs[$pos] = $currComp; // Number of components in new Ligature
2616            }
2617
2618            // Now remove the unwanted glyphs and associated metadata
2619            $newOTLdata[0] = [];
2620
2621            // Get types of new inserted chars - or replicate type of char being replaced
2622            //  $bt = Ucdn::get_bidi_class($substitute);
2623            //  if (!$bt) {
2624            $bt = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['bidi_type'];
2625            //  }
2626
2627            if (strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->unicode_hex($substitute)) !== false) {
2628                $gp = 'M';
2629            } elseif ($substitute == 32) {
2630                $gp = 'S';
2631            } else {
2632                $gp = 'C';
2633            }
2634
2635            // Need to update details of new glyphs inserted
2636            $newOTLdata[0]['general_category'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['general_category'];
2637
2638            $newOTLdata[0]['bidi_type'] = $bt;
2639            $newOTLdata[0]['group'] = $gp;
2640
2641            // KASHIDA: If forming a ligature when the last component was identified as a kashida point (final form)
2642            // If previous/first component of ligature is a medial form, then keep this as a kashida point
2643            // TEST (Arabic Typesetting) &#x64a;&#x64e;&#x646;&#x62a;&#x64f;&#x645;
2644            $ka = 0;
2645            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$GlyphPos[(count($GlyphPos) - 1)]]['GPOSinfo']['kashida'])) {
2646                $ka = $this->OTLdata[$GlyphPos[(count($GlyphPos) - 1)]]['GPOSinfo']['kashida'];
2647            }
2648            if ($ka == 1 && isset($this->OTLdata[$pos]['form']) && $this->OTLdata[$pos]['form'] == 3) {
2649                $newOTLdata[0]['GPOSinfo']['kashida'] = $ka;
2650            }
2651
2652            $newOTLdata[0]['uni'] = $substitute;
2653            $newOTLdata[0]['hex'] = $this->unicode_hex($substitute);
2654
2655            if ($this->shaper == 'I' || $this->shaper == 'K' || $this->shaper == 'S') {
2656                $newOTLdata[0]['indic_category'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['indic_category'];
2657                $newOTLdata[0]['indic_position'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['indic_position'];
2658            } elseif ($this->shaper == 'M') {
2659                $newOTLdata[0]['myanmar_category'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['myanmar_category'];
2660                $newOTLdata[0]['myanmar_position'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['myanmar_position'];
2661            }
2662            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$pos]['mask'])) {
2663                $newOTLdata[0]['mask'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['mask'];
2664            }
2665            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$pos]['syllable'])) {
2666                $newOTLdata[0]['syllable'] = $this->OTLdata[$pos]['syllable'];
2667            }
2668
2669            $newOTLdata[0]['is_ligature'] = true;
2670
2671
2672            array_splice($this->OTLdata, $pos, 1, $newOTLdata);
2673
2674            // GlyphPos contains array of arr_pos to set null - not necessarily contiguous
2675            // +- Remove any assocMarks or assocLigs from the main components (the ones that are deleted)
2676            for ($i = count($GlyphPos) - 1; $i > 0; $i--) {
2677                $gpos = $GlyphPos[$i];
2678                array_splice($this->OTLdata, $gpos, 1);
2679                unset($this->assocLigs[$gpos]);
2680                unset($this->assocMarks[$gpos]);
2681            }
2682            //  $this->assocLigs = array(); // Ligatures[$posarr lpos] => nc
2683            //  $this->assocMarks = array();    // assocMarks[$posarr mpos] => array(compID, ligPos)
2684            // Update position of pre-existing Ligatures and associated Marks
2685            // Start after first GlyphPos
2686            // count($GlyphPos)-1  is the number of glyphs removed from string
2687            for ($p = ($GlyphPos[0] + 1); $p < (count($this->OTLdata) + count($GlyphPos) - 1); $p++) {
2688                $nrem = 0; // Number of Glyphs removed at this point in the string
2689                for ($i = 0; $i < count($GlyphPos); $i++) {
2690                    if ($i > 0 && $p > $GlyphPos[$i]) {
2691                        $nrem++;
2692                    }
2693                }
2694                if (isset($this->assocLigs[$p])) {
2695                    $tmp = $this->assocLigs[$p];
2696                    unset($this->assocLigs[$p]);
2697                    $this->assocLigs[($p - $nrem)] = $tmp;
2698                }
2699                if (isset($this->assocMarks[$p])) {
2700                    $tmp = $this->assocMarks[$p];
2701                    unset($this->assocMarks[$p]);
2702                    if ($tmp['ligPos'] > $GlyphPos[0]) {
2703                        $tmp['ligPos'] -= $nrem;
2704                    }
2705                    $this->assocMarks[($p - $nrem)] = $tmp;
2706                }
2707            }
2708            return 1;
2709        } else {
2710            return 0;
2711        }
2712    }
2713
2714    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2715    //////////       ARABIC        /////////////////////////////////
2716    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2717    private function arabic_initialise()
2718    {
2719        // cf. http://unicode.org/Public/UNIDATA/ArabicShaping.txt
2720        // http://unicode.org/Public/UNIDATA/extracted/DerivedJoiningType.txt
2721        // JOIN TO FOLLOWING LETTER IN LOGICAL ORDER (i.e. AS INITIAL/MEDIAL FORM) = Unicode Left-Joining (+ Dual-Joining + Join_Causing 00640)
2722        $this->arabLeftJoining = [
2723            0x0620 => 1, 0x0626 => 1, 0x0628 => 1, 0x062A => 1, 0x062B => 1, 0x062C => 1, 0x062D => 1, 0x062E => 1,
2724            0x0633 => 1, 0x0634 => 1, 0x0635 => 1, 0x0636 => 1, 0x0637 => 1, 0x0638 => 1, 0x0639 => 1, 0x063A => 1,
2725            0x063B => 1, 0x063C => 1, 0x063D => 1, 0x063E => 1, 0x063F => 1, 0x0640 => 1, 0x0641 => 1, 0x0642 => 1,
2726            0x0643 => 1, 0x0644 => 1, 0x0645 => 1, 0x0646 => 1, 0x0647 => 1, 0x0649 => 1, 0x064A => 1, 0x066E => 1,
2727            0x066F => 1, 0x0678 => 1, 0x0679 => 1, 0x067A => 1, 0x067B => 1, 0x067C => 1, 0x067D => 1, 0x067E => 1,
2728            0x067F => 1, 0x0680 => 1, 0x0681 => 1, 0x0682 => 1, 0x0683 => 1, 0x0684 => 1, 0x0685 => 1, 0x0686 => 1,
2729            0x0687 => 1, 0x069A => 1, 0x069B => 1, 0x069C => 1, 0x069D => 1, 0x069E => 1, 0x069F => 1, 0x06A0 => 1,
2730            0x06A1 => 1, 0x06A2 => 1, 0x06A3 => 1, 0x06A4 => 1, 0x06A5 => 1, 0x06A6 => 1, 0x06A7 => 1, 0x06A8 => 1,
2731            0x06A9 => 1, 0x06AA => 1, 0x06AB => 1, 0x06AC => 1, 0x06AD => 1, 0x06AE => 1, 0x06AF => 1, 0x06B0 => 1,
2732            0x06B1 => 1, 0x06B2 => 1, 0x06B3 => 1, 0x06B4 => 1, 0x06B5 => 1, 0x06B6 => 1, 0x06B7 => 1, 0x06B8 => 1,
2733            0x06B9 => 1, 0x06BA => 1, 0x06BB => 1, 0x06BC => 1, 0x06BD => 1, 0x06BE => 1, 0x06BF => 1, 0x06C1 => 1,
2734            0x06C2 => 1, 0x06CC => 1, 0x06CE => 1, 0x06D0 => 1, 0x06D1 => 1, 0x06FA => 1, 0x06FB => 1, 0x06FC => 1,
2735            0x06FF => 1,
2736            /* Arabic Supplement */
2737            0x0750 => 1, 0x0751 => 1, 0x0752 => 1, 0x0753 => 1, 0x0754 => 1, 0x0755 => 1, 0x0756 => 1, 0x0757 => 1,
2738            0x0758 => 1, 0x075C => 1, 0x075D => 1, 0x075E => 1, 0x075F => 1, 0x0760 => 1, 0x0761 => 1, 0x0762 => 1,
2739            0x0763 => 1, 0x0764 => 1, 0x0765 => 1, 0x0766 => 1, 0x0767 => 1, 0x0768 => 1, 0x0769 => 1, 0x076A => 1,
2740            0x076D => 1, 0x076E => 1, 0x076F => 1, 0x0770 => 1, 0x0772 => 1, 0x0775 => 1, 0x0776 => 1, 0x0777 => 1,
2741            0x077A => 1, 0x077B => 1, 0x077C => 1, 0x077D => 1, 0x077E => 1, 0x077F => 1,
2742            /* Extended Arabic */
2743            0x08A0 => 1, 0x08A2 => 1, 0x08A3 => 1, 0x08A4 => 1, 0x08A5 => 1, 0x08A6 => 1, 0x08A7 => 1, 0x08A8 => 1,
2744            0x08A9 => 1,
2745            /* 'syrc' Syriac */
2746            0x0712 => 1, 0x0713 => 1, 0x0714 => 1, 0x071A => 1, 0x071B => 1, 0x071C => 1, 0x071D => 1, 0x071F => 1,
2747            0x0720 => 1, 0x0721 => 1, 0x0722 => 1, 0x0723 => 1, 0x0724 => 1, 0x0725 => 1, 0x0726 => 1, 0x0727 => 1,
2748            0x0729 => 1, 0x072B => 1, 0x072D => 1, 0x072E => 1, 0x074E => 1, 0x074F => 1,
2749            /* N'Ko */
2750            0x07CA => 1, 0x07CB => 1, 0x07CC => 1, 0x07CD => 1, 0x07CE => 1, 0x07CF => 1, 0x07D0 => 1, 0x07D1 => 1,
2751            0x07D2 => 1, 0x07D3 => 1, 0x07D4 => 1, 0x07D5 => 1, 0x07D6 => 1, 0x07D7 => 1, 0x07D8 => 1, 0x07D9 => 1,
2752            0x07DA => 1, 0x07DB => 1, 0x07DC => 1, 0x07DD => 1, 0x07DE => 1, 0x07DF => 1, 0x07E0 => 1, 0x07E1 => 1,
2753            0x07E2 => 1, 0x07E3 => 1, 0x07E4 => 1, 0x07E5 => 1, 0x07E6 => 1, 0x07E7 => 1, 0x07E8 => 1, 0x07E9 => 1,
2754            0x07EA => 1, 0x07FA => 1,
2755            /* Mandaic */
2756            0x0841 => 1, 0x0842 => 1, 0x0843 => 1, 0x0844 => 1, 0x0845 => 1, 0x0847 => 1, 0x0848 => 1, 0x084A => 1,
2757            0x084B => 1, 0x084C => 1, 0x084D => 1, 0x084E => 1, 0x0850 => 1, 0x0851 => 1, 0x0852 => 1, 0x0853 => 1,
2758            0x0855 => 1,
2759            /* ZWJ U+200D */
2760            0x0200D => 1];
2761
2762        /* JOIN TO PREVIOUS LETTER IN LOGICAL ORDER (i.e. AS FINAL/MEDIAL FORM) = Unicode Right-Joining (+ Dual-Joining + Join_Causing) */
2763        $this->arabRightJoining = [
2764            0x0620 => 1, 0x0622 => 1, 0x0623 => 1, 0x0624 => 1, 0x0625 => 1, 0x0626 => 1, 0x0627 => 1, 0x0628 => 1,
2765            0x0629 => 1, 0x062A => 1, 0x062B => 1, 0x062C => 1, 0x062D => 1, 0x062E => 1, 0x062F => 1, 0x0630 => 1,
2766            0x0631 => 1, 0x0632 => 1, 0x0633 => 1, 0x0634 => 1, 0x0635 => 1, 0x0636 => 1, 0x0637 => 1, 0x0638 => 1,
2767            0x0639 => 1, 0x063A => 1, 0x063B => 1, 0x063C => 1, 0x063D => 1, 0x063E => 1, 0x063F => 1, 0x0640 => 1,
2768            0x0641 => 1, 0x0642 => 1, 0x0643 => 1, 0x0644 => 1, 0x0645 => 1, 0x0646 => 1, 0x0647 => 1, 0x0648 => 1,
2769            0x0649 => 1, 0x064A => 1, 0x066E => 1, 0x066F => 1, 0x0671 => 1, 0x0672 => 1, 0x0673 => 1, 0x0675 => 1,
2770            0x0676 => 1, 0x0677 => 1, 0x0678 => 1, 0x0679 => 1, 0x067A => 1, 0x067B => 1, 0x067C => 1, 0x067D => 1,
2771            0x067E => 1, 0x067F => 1, 0x0680 => 1, 0x0681 => 1, 0x0682 => 1, 0x0683 => 1, 0x0684 => 1, 0x0685 => 1,
2772            0x0686 => 1, 0x0687 => 1, 0x0688 => 1, 0x0689 => 1, 0x068A => 1, 0x068B => 1, 0x068C => 1, 0x068D => 1,
2773            0x068E => 1, 0x068F => 1, 0x0690 => 1, 0x0691 => 1, 0x0692 => 1, 0x0693 => 1, 0x0694 => 1, 0x0695 => 1,
2774            0x0696 => 1, 0x0697 => 1, 0x0698 => 1, 0x0699 => 1, 0x069A => 1, 0x069B => 1, 0x069C => 1, 0x069D => 1,
2775            0x069E => 1, 0x069F => 1, 0x06A0 => 1, 0x06A1 => 1, 0x06A2 => 1, 0x06A3 => 1, 0x06A4 => 1, 0x06A5 => 1,
2776            0x06A6 => 1, 0x06A7 => 1, 0x06A8 => 1, 0x06A9 => 1, 0x06AA => 1, 0x06AB => 1, 0x06AC => 1, 0x06AD => 1,
