2777            0x06AE => 1, 0x06AF => 1, 0x06B0 => 1, 0x06B1 => 1, 0x06B2 => 1, 0x06B3 => 1, 0x06B4 => 1, 0x06B5 => 1,
2778            0x06B6 => 1, 0x06B7 => 1, 0x06B8 => 1, 0x06B9 => 1, 0x06BA => 1, 0x06BB => 1, 0x06BC => 1, 0x06BD => 1,
2779            0x06BE => 1, 0x06BF => 1, 0x06C0 => 1, 0x06C1 => 1, 0x06C2 => 1, 0x06C3 => 1, 0x06C4 => 1, 0x06C5 => 1,
2780            0x06C6 => 1, 0x06C7 => 1, 0x06C8 => 1, 0x06C9 => 1, 0x06CA => 1, 0x06CB => 1, 0x06CC => 1, 0x06CD => 1,
2781            0x06CE => 1, 0x06CF => 1, 0x06D0 => 1, 0x06D1 => 1, 0x06D2 => 1, 0x06D3 => 1, 0x06D5 => 1, 0x06EE => 1,
2782            0x06EF => 1, 0x06FA => 1, 0x06FB => 1, 0x06FC => 1, 0x06FF => 1,
2783            /* Arabic Supplement */
2784            0x0750 => 1, 0x0751 => 1, 0x0752 => 1, 0x0753 => 1, 0x0754 => 1, 0x0755 => 1, 0x0756 => 1, 0x0757 => 1,
2785            0x0758 => 1, 0x0759 => 1, 0x075A => 1, 0x075B => 1, 0x075C => 1, 0x075D => 1, 0x075E => 1, 0x075F => 1,
2786            0x0760 => 1, 0x0761 => 1, 0x0762 => 1, 0x0763 => 1, 0x0764 => 1, 0x0765 => 1, 0x0766 => 1, 0x0767 => 1,
2787            0x0768 => 1, 0x0769 => 1, 0x076A => 1, 0x076B => 1, 0x076C => 1, 0x076D => 1, 0x076E => 1, 0x076F => 1,
2788            0x0770 => 1, 0x0771 => 1, 0x0772 => 1, 0x0773 => 1, 0x0774 => 1, 0x0775 => 1, 0x0776 => 1, 0x0777 => 1,
2789            0x0778 => 1, 0x0779 => 1, 0x077A => 1, 0x077B => 1, 0x077C => 1, 0x077D => 1, 0x077E => 1, 0x077F => 1,
2790            /* Extended Arabic */
2791            0x08A0 => 1, 0x08A2 => 1, 0x08A3 => 1, 0x08A4 => 1, 0x08A5 => 1, 0x08A6 => 1, 0x08A7 => 1, 0x08A8 => 1,
2792            0x08A9 => 1, 0x08AA => 1, 0x08AB => 1, 0x08AC => 1,
2793            /* 'syrc' Syriac */
2794            0x0710 => 1, 0x0712 => 1, 0x0713 => 1, 0x0714 => 1, 0x0715 => 1, 0x0716 => 1, 0x0717 => 1, 0x0718 => 1,
2795            0x0719 => 1, 0x071A => 1, 0x071B => 1, 0x071C => 1, 0x071D => 1, 0x071E => 1, 0x071F => 1, 0x0720 => 1,
2796            0x0721 => 1, 0x0722 => 1, 0x0723 => 1, 0x0724 => 1, 0x0725 => 1, 0x0726 => 1, 0x0727 => 1, 0x0728 => 1,
2797            0x0729 => 1, 0x072A => 1, 0x072B => 1, 0x072C => 1, 0x072D => 1, 0x072E => 1, 0x072F => 1, 0x074D => 1,
2798            0x074E => 1, 0x074F,
2799            /* N'Ko */
2800            0x07CA => 1, 0x07CB => 1, 0x07CC => 1, 0x07CD => 1, 0x07CE => 1, 0x07CF => 1, 0x07D0 => 1, 0x07D1 => 1,
2801            0x07D2 => 1, 0x07D3 => 1, 0x07D4 => 1, 0x07D5 => 1, 0x07D6 => 1, 0x07D7 => 1, 0x07D8 => 1, 0x07D9 => 1,
2802            0x07DA => 1, 0x07DB => 1, 0x07DC => 1, 0x07DD => 1, 0x07DE => 1, 0x07DF => 1, 0x07E0 => 1, 0x07E1 => 1,
2803            0x07E2 => 1, 0x07E3 => 1, 0x07E4 => 1, 0x07E5 => 1, 0x07E6 => 1, 0x07E7 => 1, 0x07E8 => 1, 0x07E9 => 1,
2804            0x07EA => 1, 0x07FA => 1,
2805            /* Mandaic */
2806            0x0841 => 1, 0x0842 => 1, 0x0843 => 1, 0x0844 => 1, 0x0845 => 1, 0x0847 => 1, 0x0848 => 1, 0x084A => 1,
2807            0x084B => 1, 0x084C => 1, 0x084D => 1, 0x084E => 1, 0x0850 => 1, 0x0851 => 1, 0x0852 => 1, 0x0853 => 1,
2808            0x0855 => 1,
2809            0x0840 => 1, 0x0846 => 1, 0x0849 => 1, 0x084F => 1, 0x0854 => 1, /* Right joining */
2810            /* ZWJ U+200D */
2811            0x0200D => 1];
2812
2813        /* VOWELS = TRANSPARENT-JOINING = Unicode Transparent-Joining type (not just vowels) */
2814        $this->arabTransparent = [
2815            0x0610 => 1, 0x0611 => 1, 0x0612 => 1, 0x0613 => 1, 0x0614 => 1, 0x0615 => 1, 0x0616 => 1, 0x0617 => 1,
2816            0x0618 => 1, 0x0619 => 1, 0x061A => 1, 0x064B => 1, 0x064C => 1, 0x064D => 1, 0x064E => 1, 0x064F => 1,
2817            0x0650 => 1, 0x0651 => 1, 0x0652 => 1, 0x0653 => 1, 0x0654 => 1, 0x0655 => 1, 0x0656 => 1, 0x0657 => 1,
2818            0x0658 => 1, 0x0659 => 1, 0x065A => 1, 0x065B => 1, 0x065C => 1, 0x065D => 1, 0x065E => 1, 0x065F => 1,
2819            0x0670 => 1, 0x06D6 => 1, 0x06D7 => 1, 0x06D8 => 1, 0x06D9 => 1, 0x06DA => 1, 0x06DB => 1, 0x06DC => 1,
2820            0x06DF => 1, 0x06E0 => 1, 0x06E1 => 1, 0x06E2 => 1, 0x06E3 => 1, 0x06E4 => 1, 0x06E7 => 1, 0x06E8 => 1,
2821            0x06EA => 1, 0x06EB => 1, 0x06EC => 1, 0x06ED => 1,
2822            /* Extended Arabic */
2823            0x08E4 => 1, 0x08E5 => 1, 0x08E6 => 1, 0x08E7 => 1, 0x08E8 => 1, 0x08E9 => 1, 0x08EA => 1, 0x08EB => 1,
2824            0x08EC => 1, 0x08ED => 1, 0x08EE => 1, 0x08EF => 1, 0x08F0 => 1, 0x08F1 => 1, 0x08F2 => 1, 0x08F3 => 1,
2825            0x08F4 => 1, 0x08F5 => 1, 0x08F6 => 1, 0x08F7 => 1, 0x08F8 => 1, 0x08F9 => 1, 0x08FA => 1, 0x08FB => 1,
2826            0x08FC => 1, 0x08FD => 1, 0x08FE => 1,
2827            /* Arabic ligatures in presentation form (converted in 'ccmp' in e.g. Arial and Times ? need to add others in this range) */
2828            0xFC5E => 1, 0xFC5F => 1, 0xFC60 => 1, 0xFC61 => 1, 0xFC62 => 1,
2829            /*  'syrc' Syriac */
2830            0x070F => 1, 0x0711 => 1, 0x0730 => 1, 0x0731 => 1, 0x0732 => 1, 0x0733 => 1, 0x0734 => 1, 0x0735 => 1,
2831            0x0736 => 1, 0x0737 => 1, 0x0738 => 1, 0x0739 => 1, 0x073A => 1, 0x073B => 1, 0x073C => 1, 0x073D => 1,
2832            0x073E => 1, 0x073F => 1, 0x0740 => 1, 0x0741 => 1, 0x0742 => 1, 0x0743 => 1, 0x0744 => 1, 0x0745 => 1,
2833            0x0746 => 1, 0x0747 => 1, 0x0748 => 1, 0x0749 => 1, 0x074A => 1,
2834            /* N'Ko */
2835            0x07EB => 1, 0x07EC => 1, 0x07ED => 1, 0x07EE => 1, 0x07EF => 1, 0x07F0 => 1, 0x07F1 => 1, 0x07F2 => 1,
2836            0x07F3 => 1,
2837            /* Mandaic */
2838            0x0859 => 1, 0x085A => 1, 0x085B => 1,
2839        ];
2840    }
2841
2842    private function arabic_shaper($usetags, $scriptTag)
2843    {
2844        $chars = [];
2845        for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->OTLdata); $i++) {
2846            $chars[] = $this->OTLdata[$i]['hex'];
2847        }
2848
2849        $crntChar = null;
2850        $prevChar = null;
2851        $nextChar = null;
2852        $output = [];
2853        $max = count($chars);
2854        for ($i = $max - 1; $i >= 0; $i--) {
2855            $crntChar = $chars[$i];
2856            if ($i > 0) {
2857                $prevChar = hexdec($chars[$i - 1]);
2858            } else {
2859                $prevChar = null;
2860            }
2861            if ($prevChar && isset($this->arabTransparentJoin[$prevChar]) && isset($chars[$i - 2])) {
2862                $prevChar = hexdec($chars[$i - 2]);
2863                if ($prevChar && isset($this->arabTransparentJoin[$prevChar]) && isset($chars[$i - 3])) {
2864                    $prevChar = hexdec($chars[$i - 3]);
2865                    if ($prevChar && isset($this->arabTransparentJoin[$prevChar]) && isset($chars[$i - 4])) {
2866                        $prevChar = hexdec($chars[$i - 4]);
2867                    }
2868                }
2869            }
2870            if ($crntChar && isset($this->arabTransparentJoin[hexdec($crntChar)])) {
2871                // If next_char = RightJoining && prev_char = LeftJoining:
2872                if (isset($chars[$i + 1]) && $chars[$i + 1] && isset($this->arabRightJoining[hexdec($chars[$i + 1])]) && $prevChar && isset($this->arabLeftJoining[$prevChar])) {
2873                    $output[] = $this->get_arab_glyphs($crntChar, 1, $chars, $i, $scriptTag, $usetags); // <final> form
2874                } else {
2875                    $output[] = $this->get_arab_glyphs($crntChar, 0, $chars, $i, $scriptTag, $usetags);  // <isolated> form
2876                }
2877                continue;
2878            }
2879            if (hexdec($crntChar) < 128) {
2880                $output[] = [$crntChar, 0];
2881                $nextChar = $crntChar;
2882                continue;
2883            }
2884            // 0=ISOLATED FORM :: 1=FINAL :: 2=INITIAL :: 3=MEDIAL
2885            $form = 0;
2886            if ($prevChar && isset($this->arabLeftJoining[$prevChar])) {
2887                $form++;
2888            }
2889            if ($nextChar && isset($this->arabRightJoining[hexdec($nextChar)])) {
2890                $form += 2;
2891            }
2892            $output[] = $this->get_arab_glyphs($crntChar, $form, $chars, $i, $scriptTag, $usetags);
2893            $nextChar = $crntChar;
2894        }
2895        $ra = array_reverse($output);
2896        for ($i = 0; $i < count($this->OTLdata); $i++) {
2897            $this->OTLdata[$i]['uni'] = hexdec($ra[$i][0]);
2898            $this->OTLdata[$i]['hex'] = $ra[$i][0];
2899            $this->OTLdata[$i]['form'] = $ra[$i][1]; // Actaul form substituted 0=ISOLATED FORM :: 1=FINAL :: 2=INITIAL :: 3=MEDIAL
2900        }
2901    }
2902
2903    private function get_arab_glyphs($char, $type, &$chars, $i, $scriptTag, $usetags)
2904    {
2905        // Optional Feature settings    // doesn't control Syriac at present
2906        if (($type === 0 && strpos($usetags, 'isol') === false) || ($type === 1 && strpos($usetags, 'fina') === false) || ($type === 2 && strpos($usetags, 'init') === false) || ($type === 3 && strpos($usetags, 'medi') === false)) {
2907            return [$char, 0];
2908        }
2909
2910        // 0=ISOLATED FORM :: 1=FINAL :: 2=INITIAL :: 3=MEDIAL (:: 4=MED2 :: 5=FIN2 :: 6=FIN3)
2911        $retk = -1;
2912        // Alaph 00710 in Syriac
2913        if ($scriptTag == 'syrc' && $char == '00710') {
2914            // if there is a preceding (base?) character *** should search back to previous base - ignoring vowels and change $n
2915            // set $n as the position of the last base; for now we'll just do this:
2916            $n = $i - 1;
2917            // if the preceding (base) character cannot be joined to
2918            // not in $this->arabLeftJoining i.e. not a char which can join to the next one
2919            if (isset($chars[$n]) && isset($this->arabLeftJoining[hexdec($chars[$n])])) {
2920                // if in the middle of Syriac words
2921                if (isset($chars[$i + 1]) && preg_match('/[\x{0700}-\x{0745}]/u', UtfString::code2utf(hexdec($chars[$n]))) && preg_match('/[\x{0700}-\x{0745}]/u', UtfString::code2utf(hexdec($chars[$i + 1]))) && isset($this->arabGlyphs[$char][4])) {
2922                    $retk = 4;
2923                } // if at the end of Syriac words
2924                elseif (!isset($chars[$i + 1]) || !preg_match('/[\x{0700}-\x{0745}]/u', UtfString::code2utf(hexdec($chars[$i + 1])))) {
2925                    // if preceding base character IS (00715|00716|0072A)
2926                    if (strpos('0715|0716|072A', $chars[$n]) !== false && isset($this->arabGlyphs[$char][6])) {
2927                        $retk = 6;
2928                    } // elseif preceding base character is NOT (00715|00716|0072A)
2929                    elseif (isset($this->arabGlyphs[$char][5])) {
2930                        $retk = 5;
2931                    }
2932                }
2933            }
2934            if ($retk != -1) {
2935                return [$this->arabGlyphs[$char][$retk], $retk];
2936            } else {
2937                return [$char, 0];
2938            }
2939        }
2940
2941        if (($type > 0 || $type === 0) && isset($this->arabGlyphs[$char][$type])) {
2942            $retk = $type;
2943        } elseif ($type == 3 && isset($this->arabGlyphs[$char][1])) { // if <medial> not defined, but <final>, return <final>
2944            $retk = 1;
2945        } elseif ($type == 2 && isset($this->arabGlyphs[$char][0])) { // if <initial> not defined, but <isolated>, return <isolated>
2946            $retk = 0;
2947        }
2948        if ($retk != -1) {
2949            $match = true;
2950            // If GSUB includes a Backtrack or Lookahead condition (e.g. font ArabicTypesetting)
2951            if (isset($this->arabGlyphs[$char]['prel'][$retk]) && $this->arabGlyphs[$char]['prel'][$retk]) {
2952                $ig = 1;
2953                foreach ($this->arabGlyphs[$char]['prel'][$retk] as $k => $v) { // $k starts 0, 1...
2954                    if (!isset($chars[$i - $ig - $k])) {
2955                        $match = false;
2956                    } elseif (strpos($v, $chars[$i - $ig - $k]) === false) {
2957                        while (strpos($this->arabGlyphs[$char]['ignore'][$retk], $chars[$i - $ig - $k]) !== false) {  // ignore
2958                            $ig++;
2959                        }
2960                        if (!isset($chars[$i - $ig - $k])) {
2961                            $match = false;
2962                        } elseif (strpos($v, $chars[$i - $ig - $k]) === false) {
2963                            $match = false;
2964                        }
2965                    }
2966                }
2967            }
2968            if (isset($this->arabGlyphs[$char]['postl'][$retk]) && $this->arabGlyphs[$char]['postl'][$retk]) {
2969                $ig = 1;
2970                foreach ($this->arabGlyphs[$char]['postl'][$retk] as $k => $v) { // $k starts 0, 1...
2971                    if (!isset($chars[$i + $ig + $k])) {
2972                        $match = false;
2973                    } elseif (strpos($v, $chars[$i + $ig + $k]) === false) {
2974                        while (strpos($this->arabGlyphs[$char]['ignore'][$retk], $chars[$i + $ig + $k]) !== false) {  // ignore
2975                            $ig++;
2976                        }
2977                        if (!isset($chars[$i + $ig + $k])) {
2978                            $match = false;
2979                        } elseif (strpos($v, $chars[$i + $ig + $k]) === false) {
2980                            $match = false;
2981                        }
2982                    }
2983                }
2984            }
2985            if ($match) {
2986                return [$this->arabGlyphs[$char][$retk], $retk];
2987            } else {
2988                return [$char, 0];
2989            }
2990        } else {
2991            return [$char, 0];
2992        }
2993    }
2994
2995    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2996    /////////////////       LINE BREAKING    ///////////////////////
2997    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2998    /////////////       TIBETAN LINE BREAKING    ///////////////////
2999    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3000    // Sets $this->OTLdata[$i]['wordend']=true at possible end of word boundaries
3001    private function tibetanLineBreaking()
3002    {
3003        for ($ptr = 0; $ptr < count($this->OTLdata); $ptr++) {
3004            // Break opportunities at U+0F0B Tsheg or U=0F0D
3005            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni']) && ($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'] == 0x0F0B || $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'] == 0x0F0D)) {
3006                if (isset($this->OTLdata[$ptr + 1]['uni']) && ($this->OTLdata[$ptr + 1]['uni'] == 0x0F0D || $this->OTLdata[$ptr + 1]['uni'] == 0xF0E)) {
3007                    continue;
3008                }
3009                // Set end of word marker in OTLdata at matchpos
3010                $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['wordend'] = true;
3011            }
3012        }
3013    }
3014
3015    /**
3016     * South East Asian Linebreaking (Thai, Khmer and Lao) using dictionary of words
3017     *
3018     * Sets $this->OTLdata[$i]['wordend']=true at possible end of word boundaries
3019     */
3020    private function seaLineBreaking()
3021    {
3022        // Load Line-breaking dictionary
3023        if (!isset($this->lbdicts[$this->shaper]) && file_exists(__DIR__ . '/../data/linebrdict' . $this->shaper . '.dat')) {
3024            $this->lbdicts[$this->shaper] = file_get_contents(__DIR__ . '/../data/linebrdict' . $this->shaper . '.dat');
3025        }
3026
3027        $dict = &$this->lbdicts[$this->shaper];
3028
3029        // Find all word boundaries and mark end of word $this->OTLdata[$i]['wordend']=true on last character
3030        // If Thai, allow for possible suffixes (not in Lao or Khmer)
3031        // repeater/ellision characters
3032        // (0x0E2F);        // Ellision character THAI_PAIYANNOI 0x0E2F  UTF-8 0xE0 0xB8 0xAF
3033        // (0x0E46);        // Repeat character THAI_MAIYAMOK 0x0E46   UTF-8 0xE0 0xB9 0x86
3034        // (0x0EC6);        // Repeat character LAO   UTF-8 0xE0 0xBB 0x86
3035
3036        $rollover = [];
3037        $ptr = 0;
3038
3039        while ($ptr < count($this->OTLdata) - 3) {
3040            if (count($rollover)) {
3041                $matches = $rollover;
3042                $rollover = [];
3043            } else {
3044                $matches = $this->checkwordmatch($dict, $ptr);
3045            }
3046            if (count($matches) == 1) {
3047                $matchpos = $matches[0];
3048                // Check for repeaters - if so $matchpos++
3049                if (isset($this->OTLdata[$matchpos + 1]['uni']) && ($this->OTLdata[$matchpos + 1]['uni'] == 0x0E2F || $this->OTLdata[$matchpos + 1]['uni'] == 0x0E46 || $this->OTLdata[$matchpos + 1]['uni'] == 0x0EC6)) {
3050                    $matchpos++;
3051                }
3052                // Set end of word marker in OTLdata at matchpos
3053                $this->OTLdata[$matchpos]['wordend'] = true;
3054                $ptr = $matchpos + 1;
3055            } elseif (empty($matches)) {
3056                $ptr++;
3057                // Move past any ASCII characters
3058                while (isset($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni']) && ($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'] >> 8) == 0) {
3059                    $ptr++;
3060                }
3061            } else { // Multiple matches
3062                $secondmatch = false;
3063                for ($m = count($matches) - 1; $m >= 0; $m--) {
3064                    //for ($m=0;$m<count($matches);$m++) {
3065                    $firstmatch = $matches[$m];
3066                    $matches2 = $this->checkwordmatch($dict, $firstmatch + 1);
3067                    if (count($matches2)) {
3068                        // Set end of word marker in OTLdata at matchpos
3069                        $this->OTLdata[$firstmatch]['wordend'] = true;
3070                        $ptr = $firstmatch + 1;
3071                        $rollover = $matches2;
3072                        $secondmatch = true;
3073                        break;
3074                    }
3075                }
3076                if (!$secondmatch) {
3077                    // Set end of word marker in OTLdata at end of longest first match
3078                    $this->OTLdata[$matches[count($matches) - 1]]['wordend'] = true;
3079                    $ptr = $matches[count($matches) - 1] + 1;
3080                    // Move past any ASCII characters
3081                    while (isset($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni']) && ($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'] >> 8) == 0) {
3082                        $ptr++;
3083                    }
3084                }
3085            }
3086        }
3087    }
3088
3089    private function checkwordmatch(&$dict, $ptr)
3090    {
3091        /*
3092          Node type: Split.
3093          Divide at < 98 >= 98
3094          Offset for >= 98 == 79    (long 4-byte unsigned)
3095
3096          Node type: Linear match.
3097          Char = 97
3098
3099          Intermediate match
3100
3101          Final match
3102         */
3103
3104        $dictptr = 0;
3105        $ok = true;
3106        $matches = [];
3107        while ($ok) {
3108            $x = ord($dict[$dictptr]);
3109            $c = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'] & 0xFF;
3110            if ($x == static::_DICT_INTERMEDIATE_MATCH) {
3111//echo "DICT_INTERMEDIATE_MATCH: ".dechex($c).'<br />';
3112                // Do not match if next character in text is a Mark
3113                if (isset($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni']) && strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['hex']) === false) {
3114                    $matches[] = $ptr - 1;
3115                }
3116                $dictptr++;
3117            } elseif ($x == static::_DICT_FINAL_MATCH) {
3118//echo "DICT_FINAL_MATCH: ".dechex($c).'<br />';
3119                // Do not match if next character in text is a Mark
3120                if (isset($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni']) && strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['hex']) === false) {
3121                    $matches[] = $ptr - 1;
3122                }
3123                return $matches;
3124            } elseif ($x == static::_DICT_NODE_TYPE_LINEAR) {
3125//echo "DICT_NODE_TYPE_LINEAR: ".dechex($c).'<br />';
3126                $dictptr++;
3127                $m = ord($dict[$dictptr]);
3128                if ($c == $m) {
3129                    $ptr++;
3130                    if ($ptr > count($this->OTLdata) - 1) {
3131                        $next = ord($dict[$dictptr + 1]);
3132                        if ($next == static::_DICT_INTERMEDIATE_MATCH || $next == static::_DICT_FINAL_MATCH) {
3133                            // Do not match if next character in text is a Mark
3134                            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni']) && strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['hex']) === false) {
3135                                $matches[] = $ptr - 1;
3136                            }
3137                        }
3138                        return $matches;
3139                    }
3140                    $dictptr++;
3141                    continue;
3142                } else {
3143//echo "DICT_NODE_TYPE_LINEAR NOT: ".dechex($c).'<br />';
3144                    return $matches;
3145                }
3146            } elseif ($x == static::_DICT_NODE_TYPE_SPLIT) {
3147//echo "DICT_NODE_TYPE_SPLIT ON ".dechex($d).": ".dechex($c).'<br />';
3148                $dictptr++;
3149                $d = ord($dict[$dictptr]);
3150                if ($c < $d) {
3151                    $dictptr += 5;
3152                } else {
3153                    $dictptr++;
3154                    // Unsigned long 32-bit offset
3155                    $offset = (ord($dict[$dictptr]) * 16777216) + (ord($dict[$dictptr + 1]) << 16) + (ord($dict[$dictptr + 2]) << 8) + ord($dict[$dictptr + 3]);
3156                    $dictptr = $offset;
3157                }
3158            } else {
3159//echo "PROBLEM: ".($x).'<br />';
3160                $ok = false; // Something has gone wrong
3161            }
3162        }
3163
3164        return $matches;
3165    }
3166
3167    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3168    //////////       GPOS    ///////////////////////////////////////
3169    ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3170    private function _applyGPOSrules($LookupList, $is_old_spec = false)
3171    {
3172        foreach ($LookupList as $lu => $tag) {
3173            $Type = $this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['Type'];
3174            $Flag = $this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['Flag'];
3175            $MarkFilteringSet = '';
3176            if (isset($this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'])) {
3177                $MarkFilteringSet = $this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'];
3178            }
3179            $ptr = 0;
3180            // Test each glyph sequentially
3181            while ($ptr < (count($this->OTLdata))) { // whilst there is another glyph ..0064
3182                $currGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['hex'];
3183                $currGID = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'];
3184                $shift = 1;
3185                foreach ($this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['Subtables'] as $c => $subtable_offset) {
3186                    // NB Coverage only looks at glyphs for position 1 (esp. 7.3 and 8.3)
3187                    if (isset($this->LuCoverage[$lu][$c][$currGID])) {
3188                        // Get rules from font GPOS subtable
3189                        if (isset($this->OTLdata[$ptr]['bidi_type'])) {  // No need to check bidi_type - just a check that it exists
3190                            $shift = $this->_applyGPOSsubtable($lu, $c, $ptr, $currGlyph, $currGID, ($subtable_offset - $this->GPOS_offset + $this->GSUB_length), $Type, $Flag, $MarkFilteringSet, $this->LuCoverage[$lu][$c], $tag, 0, $is_old_spec);
3191                            if ($shift) {
3192                                break;
3193                            }
3194                        }
3195                    }
3196                }
3197                if ($shift == 0) {
3198                    $shift = 1;
3199                }
3200                $ptr += $shift;
3201            }
3202        }
3203    }
3204
3205    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3206    // GPOS Types
3207    // Lookup Type 1: Single Adjustment Positioning Subtable        Adjust position of a single glyph
3208    // Lookup Type 2: Pair Adjustment Positioning Subtable      Adjust position of a pair of glyphs
3209    // Lookup Type 3: Cursive Attachment Positioning Subtable       Attach cursive glyphs
3210    // Lookup Type 4: MarkToBase Attachment Positioning Subtable    Attach a combining mark to a base glyph
3211    // Lookup Type 5: MarkToLigature Attachment Positioning Subtable    Attach a combining mark to a ligature
3212    // Lookup Type 6: MarkToMark Attachment Positioning Subtable    Attach a combining mark to another mark
3213    // Lookup Type 7: Contextual Positioning Subtables          Position one or more glyphs in context
3214    // Lookup Type 8: Chaining Contextual Positioning Subtable      Position one or more glyphs in chained context
3215    // Lookup Type 9: Extension positioning
3216    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3217    private function _applyGPOSvaluerecord($basepos, $Value)
3218    {
3219
3220        // If current glyph is a mark with a defined width, any XAdvance is considered to REPLACE the character Advance Width
3221        // Test case <div style="font-family:myanmartext">&#x1004;&#x103a;&#x1039;&#x1000;&#x1039;&#x1000;&#x103b;&#x103c;&#x103d;&#x1031;&#x102d;</div>
3222        if (strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->OTLdata[$basepos]['hex']) !== false) {
3223            $cw = round($this->mpdf->_getCharWidth($this->mpdf->CurrentFont['cw'], $this->OTLdata[$basepos]['uni']) * $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm'] / 1000); // convert back to font design units
3224        } else {
3225            $cw = 0;
3226        }
3227
3228        $apos = $this->_getXAdvancePos($basepos);
3229
3230        if (isset($Value['XAdvance']) && ($Value['XAdvance'] - $cw) != 0) {
3231            // However DON'T REPLACE the character Advance Width if Advance Width is negative
3232            // Test case <div style="font-family: dejavusansmono">&#x440;&#x443;&#x301;&#x441;&#x441;&#x43a;&#x438;&#x439;</div>
3233            if ($Value['XAdvance'] < 0) {
3234                $cw = 0;
3235            }
3236
3237            // For LTR apply XAdvanceL to the last mark following the base = at $apos
3238            // For RTL apply XAdvanceR to base = at $basepos
3239            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$apos]['GPOSinfo']['XAdvanceL'])) {
3240                $this->OTLdata[$apos]['GPOSinfo']['XAdvanceL'] += $Value['XAdvance'] - $cw;
3241            } else {
3242                $this->OTLdata[$apos]['GPOSinfo']['XAdvanceL'] = $Value['XAdvance'] - $cw;
3243            }
3244            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$basepos]['GPOSinfo']['XAdvanceR'])) {
3245                $this->OTLdata[$basepos]['GPOSinfo']['XAdvanceR'] += $Value['XAdvance'] - $cw;
3246            } else {
3247                $this->OTLdata[$basepos]['GPOSinfo']['XAdvanceR'] = $Value['XAdvance'] - $cw;
3248            }
3249        }
3250
3251        // Any XPlacement (? and Y Placement) apply to base and marks (from basepos to apos)
3252        for ($a = $basepos; $a <= $apos; $a++) {
3253            if (isset($Value['XPlacement'])) {
3254                if (isset($this->OTLdata[$a]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement'])) {
3255                    $this->OTLdata[$a]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement'] += $Value['XPlacement'];
3256                } else {
3257                    $this->OTLdata[$a]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement'] = $Value['XPlacement'];
3258                }
3259            }
3260            if (isset($Value['YPlacement'])) {
3261                if (isset($this->OTLdata[$a]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement'])) {
3262                    $this->OTLdata[$a]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement'] += $Value['YPlacement'];
3263                } else {
3264                    $this->OTLdata[$a]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement'] = $Value['YPlacement'];
3265                }
3266            }
3267        }
3268    }
3269
3270    // If XAdvance is aplied to $ptr - in order for PDF to position the Advance correctly need to place it on
3271    // the last of any Marks which immediately follow the current glyph
3272    private function _getXAdvancePos($pos)
3273    {
3274        // NB Not all fonts have all marks specified in GlyphClassMarks
3275        // If the current glyph is not a base (but a mark) then ignore this, and apply to the current position
3276        if (strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->OTLdata[$pos]['hex']) !== false) {
3277            return $pos;
3278        }
3279
3280        while (isset($this->OTLdata[$pos + 1]['hex']) && strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->OTLdata[$pos + 1]['hex']) !== false) {
3281            $pos++;
3282        }
3283        return $pos;
3284    }
3285
3286    private function _applyGPOSsubtable($lookupID, $subtable, $ptr, $currGlyph, $currGID, $subtable_offset, $Type, $Flag, $MarkFilteringSet, $LuCoverage, $tag, $level, $is_old_spec)
3287    {
3288        if (($Flag & 0x0001) == 1) {
3289            $dir = 'RTL';
3290        } else { // only used for Type 3
3291            $dir = 'LTR';
3292        }
3293
3294        $ignore = $this->_getGCOMignoreString($Flag, $MarkFilteringSet);
3295
3296        // Lets start
3297        $this->seek($subtable_offset);
3298        $PosFormat = $this->read_ushort();
3299
3300        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3301        // LookupType 1: Single adjustment  Adjust position of a single glyph (e.g. SmallCaps/Sups/Subs)
3302        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3303        if ($Type == 1) {
3304            //===========
3305            // Format 1:
3306            //===========
3307            if ($PosFormat == 1) {
3308                $Coverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3309                $ValueFormat = $this->read_ushort();
3310                $Value = $this->_getValueRecord($ValueFormat);
3311            } //===========
3312            // Format 2:
3313            //===========
3314            elseif ($PosFormat == 2) {
3315                $Coverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3316                $ValueFormat = $this->read_ushort();
3317                $ValueCount = $this->read_ushort();
3318                $GlyphPos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
3319                $this->skip($GlyphPos * 2 * $this->count_bits($ValueFormat));
3320                $Value = $this->_getValueRecord($ValueFormat);
3321            }
3322            $this->_applyGPOSvaluerecord($ptr, $Value);
3323            if ($this->debugOTL) {
3324                $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
3325            }
3326            return 1;
3327        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3328        // LookupType 2: Pair adjustment    Adjust position of a pair of glyphs (Kerning)
3329        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3330        elseif ($Type == 2) {
3331            $Coverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3332            $ValueFormat1 = $this->read_ushort();
3333            $ValueFormat2 = $this->read_ushort();
3334            $sizeOfPair = ( 2 * $this->count_bits($ValueFormat1) ) + ( 2 * $this->count_bits($ValueFormat2) );
3335            //===========
3336            // Format 1:
3337            //===========
3338            if ($PosFormat == 1) {
3339                $PairSetCount = $this->read_ushort();
3340                $PairSetOffset = [];
3341                for ($p = 0; $p < $PairSetCount; $p++) {
3342                    $PairSetOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3343                }
3344                for ($p = 0; $p < $PairSetCount; $p++) {
3345                    if (isset($LuCoverage[$currGID]) && $LuCoverage[$currGID] == $p) {
3346                        $this->seek($PairSetOffset[$p]);
3347                        //PairSet table
3348                        $PairValueCount = $this->read_ushort();
3349                        for ($pv = 0; $pv < $PairValueCount; $pv++) {
3350                            //PairValueRecord
3351                            $gid = $this->read_ushort();
3352                            $SecondGlyph = $this->glyphToChar($gid);
3353                            $FirstGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'];
3354
3355                            $checkpos = $ptr;
3356                            $checkpos++;
3357                            while (isset($this->OTLdata[$checkpos]) && strpos($ignore, $this->OTLdata[$checkpos]['hex']) !== false) {
3358                                $checkpos++;
3359                            }
3360                            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$checkpos]) && $this->OTLdata[$checkpos]['uni'] == $SecondGlyph) {
3361                                $matchedpos = $checkpos;
3362                            } else {
3363                                $matchedpos = false;
3364                            }
3365
3366                            if ($matchedpos !== false) {
3367                                $Value1 = $this->_getValueRecord($ValueFormat1);
3368                                $Value2 = $this->_getValueRecord($ValueFormat2);
3369                                if ($ValueFormat1) {
3370                                    $this->_applyGPOSvaluerecord($ptr, $Value1);
3371                                }
3372                                if ($ValueFormat2) {
3373                                    $this->_applyGPOSvaluerecord($matchedpos, $Value2);
3374                                    if ($this->debugOTL) {
3375                                        $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
3376                                    }
3377                                    return $matchedpos - $ptr + 1;
3378                                }
3379                                if ($this->debugOTL) {
3380                                    $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
3381                                }
3382                                return $matchedpos - $ptr;
3383                            } else {
3384                                $this->skip($sizeOfPair);
3385                            }
3386                        }
3387                    }
3388                }
3389                return 0;
3390            } //===========
3391            // Format 2:
3392            //===========
3393            elseif ($PosFormat == 2) {
3394                $ClassDef1 = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3395                $ClassDef2 = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3396                $Class1Count = $this->read_ushort();
3397                $Class2Count = $this->read_ushort();
3398
3399                $sizeOfValueRecords = $Class1Count * $Class2Count * $sizeOfPair;
3400
3401                //$this->skip($sizeOfValueRecords );  ???? NOT NEEDED
3402                // NB Class1Count includes Class 0 even though it is not defined by $ClassDef1
3403                // i.e. Class1Count = 5; Class1 will contain array(indices 1-4);
3404                $Class1 = $this->_getClassDefinitionTable($ClassDef1);
3405                $Class2 = $this->_getClassDefinitionTable($ClassDef2);
3406                $FirstGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['uni'];
3407                $checkpos = $ptr;
3408                $checkpos++;
3409                while (isset($this->OTLdata[$checkpos]) && strpos($ignore, $this->OTLdata[$checkpos]['hex']) !== false) {
3410                    $checkpos++;
3411                }
3412                if (isset($this->OTLdata[$checkpos])) {
3413                    $matchedpos = $checkpos;
3414                } else {
3415                    return 0;
3416                }
3417
3418                $SecondGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['uni'];
3419                for ($i = 0; $i < $Class1Count; $i++) {
3420                    if (isset($Class1[$i]) && count($Class1[$i])) {
3421                        $FirstClassPos = array_search($FirstGlyph, $Class1[$i]);
3422                        if ($FirstClassPos === false) {
3423                            continue;
3424                        } else {
3425                            for ($j = 0; $j < $Class2Count; $j++) {
3426                                if (isset($Class2[$j]) && count($Class2[$j])) {
3427                                    $SecondClassPos = array_search($SecondGlyph, $Class2[$j]);
3428                                    if ($SecondClassPos === false) {
3429                                        continue;
3430                                    }
3431
3432                                    // Get ValueRecord[$i][$j]
3433                                    $offs = ($i * $Class2Count * $sizeOfPair) + ($j * $sizeOfPair);
3434                                    $this->seek($subtable_offset + 16 + $offs);
3435
3436                                    $Value1 = $this->_getValueRecord($ValueFormat1);
3437                                    $Value2 = $this->_getValueRecord($ValueFormat2);
3438                                    if ($ValueFormat1) {
3439                                        $this->_applyGPOSvaluerecord($ptr, $Value1);
3440                                    }
3441                                    if ($ValueFormat2) {
3442                                        $this->_applyGPOSvaluerecord($matchedpos, $Value2);
3443                                        if ($this->debugOTL) {
3444                                            $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
3445                                        }
3446                                        return $matchedpos - $ptr + 1;
3447                                    }
3448                                    if ($this->debugOTL) {
3449                                        $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
3450                                    }
3451                                    return $matchedpos - $ptr;
3452                                }
3453                            }
3454                        }
3455                    }
3456                }
3457                return 0;
3458            }
3459        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3460        // LookupType 3: Cursive attachment     Attach cursive glyphs
3461        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3462        elseif ($Type == 3) {
3463            $this->skip(4);
3464            // Need default XAdvance for glyph
3465            $pdfWidth = $this->mpdf->_getCharWidth($this->mpdf->CurrentFont['cw'], hexdec($currGlyph)); // DON'T convert back to design units
3466
3467            $CPos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
3468            $this->skip($CPos * 4);
3469            $EntryAnchor = $this->read_ushort();
3470            $ExitAnchor = $this->read_ushort();
3471            if ($EntryAnchor != 0) {
3472                $EntryAnchor += $subtable_offset;
3473                list($x, $y) = $this->_getAnchorTable($EntryAnchor);
3474                if ($dir == 'RTL') {
3475                    if (round($pdfWidth) == round($x * 1000 / $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm'])) {
3476                        $x = 0;
3477                    } else {
3478                        $x = $x - ($pdfWidth * $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm'] / 1000);
3479                    }
3480                }
3481
3482                $this->Entry[$ptr] = ['X' => $x, 'Y' => $y, 'dir' => $dir];
3483            }
3484            if ($ExitAnchor != 0) {
3485                $ExitAnchor += $subtable_offset;
3486                list($x, $y) = $this->_getAnchorTable($ExitAnchor);
3487                if ($dir == 'LTR') {
3488                    if (round($pdfWidth) == round($x * 1000 / $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm'])) {
3489                        $x = 0;
3490                    } else {
3491                        $x = $x - ($pdfWidth * $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm'] / 1000);
3492                    }
3493                }
3494                $this->Exit[$ptr] = ['X' => $x, 'Y' => $y, 'dir' => $dir];
3495            }
3496            if ($this->debugOTL) {
3497                $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
3498            }
3499            return 1;
3500        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3501        // LookupType 4: MarkToBase attachment  Attach a combining mark to a base glyph
3502        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3503        elseif ($Type == 4) {
3504            $MarkCoverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3505            //$MarkCoverage is already set in $LuCoverage 00065|00073 etc
3506            $BaseCoverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3507            $ClassCount = $this->read_ushort(); // Number of classes defined for marks = Number of mark glyphs in the MarkCoverage table
3508            $MarkArray = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // Offset to MarkArray table
3509            $BaseArray = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // Offset to BaseArray table
3510
3511            $this->seek($BaseCoverage);
3512            $BaseGlyphs = implode('|', $this->_getCoverage());
3513
3514            $checkpos = $ptr;
3515            $checkpos--;
3516
3517            // ZZZ93
3518            // In Lohit-Kannada font (old-spec), rules specify a Type 4 GPOS to attach below-forms to base glyph
3519            // the repositioning does not happen in MS Word, and shouldn't happen comparing with other fonts
3520            // ?Why not
3521            // This Fix blocks the GPOS rule if the "mark" is not actually classified as a mark in the GlyphClasses of GDEF
3522            // but only in Indic old-spec.
3523            // Test cases: &#xca8;&#xccd;&#xca8;&#xcc1; and &#xc95;&#xccd;&#xcb0;&#xccc;
3524            if ($this->shaper == 'I' && $is_old_spec && strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['hex']) === false) {
3525                return;
3526            }
3527
3528
3529            // "To identify the base glyph that combines with a mark, the text-processing client must look backward in the glyph string from the mark to the preceding base glyph."
3530            while (isset($this->OTLdata[$checkpos]) && strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->OTLdata[$checkpos]['hex']) !== false) {
3531                $checkpos--;
3532            }
3533
3534            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$checkpos]) && strpos($BaseGlyphs, $this->OTLdata[$checkpos]['hex']) !== false) {
3535                $matchedpos = $checkpos;
3536            } else {
3537                $matchedpos = false;
3538            }
3539
3540            if ($matchedpos !== false) {
3541                // Get the relevant MarkRecord
3542                $MarkPos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
3543                $MarkRecord = $this->_getMarkRecord($MarkArray, $MarkPos); // e.g. Array ( [Class] => 0 [AnchorX] => -549 [AnchorY] => 1548 )
3544                //Mark Class is = $MarkRecord['Class']
3545                // Get the relevant BaseRecord
3546                $this->seek($BaseArray);
3547                $BaseCount = $this->read_ushort();
3548                $BasePos = strpos($BaseGlyphs, $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['hex']) / 6;
3549
3550                // Move to the BaseRecord we want
3551                $nSkip = (2 * $BasePos * $ClassCount );
3552                $this->skip($nSkip);
3553
3554                // Read BaseRecord we want for appropriate Class
3555                $nSkip = 2 * $MarkRecord['Class'];
3556                $this->skip($nSkip);
3557                $BaseRecordOffset = $BaseArray + $this->read_ushort();
3558                list($x, $y) = $this->_getAnchorTable($BaseRecordOffset);
3559                $BaseRecord = ['AnchorX' => $x, 'AnchorY' => $y]; // e.g. Array ( [AnchorX] => 660 [AnchorY] => 1556 )
3560                // Need default XAdvance for Base glyph
3561                $BaseWidth = $this->mpdf->_getCharWidth($this->mpdf->CurrentFont['cw'], $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['uni']) * $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm'] / 1000; // convert back to font design units
3562                $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth'] = $BaseWidth;
3563                // And any intervening (ignored) characters
3564                if (($ptr - $matchedpos) > 1) {
3565                    for ($i = $matchedpos + 1; $i < $ptr; $i++) {
3566                        $BaseWidthExtra = $this->mpdf->_getCharWidth($this->mpdf->CurrentFont['cw'], $this->OTLdata[$i]['uni']) * $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm'] / 1000; // convert back to font design units
3567                        $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth'] += $BaseWidthExtra;
3568                    }
3569                }
3570
3571                // Align to previous Glyph by attachment - so need to add to previous placement values
3572                $prevXPlacement = (isset($this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement']) ? $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement'] : 0);
3573                $prevYPlacement = (isset($this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement']) ? $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement'] : 0);
3574
3575                $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement'] = $prevXPlacement + $BaseRecord['AnchorX'] - $MarkRecord['AnchorX'];
3576                $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement'] = $prevYPlacement + $BaseRecord['AnchorY'] - $MarkRecord['AnchorY'];
3577                if ($this->debugOTL) {
3578                    $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
3579                }
3580                return 1;
3581            }
3582            return 0;
3583        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3584        // LookupType 5: MarkToLigature attachment  Attach a combining mark to a ligature
3585        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3586        elseif ($Type == 5) {
3587            $MarkCoverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3588            //$MarkCoverage is already set in $LuCoverage 00065|00073 etc
3589            $LigatureCoverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3590            $ClassCount = $this->read_ushort(); // Number of classes defined for marks = Number of mark glyphs in the MarkCoverage table
3591            $MarkArray = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // Offset to MarkArray table
3592            $LigatureArray = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // Offset to LigatureArray table
3593
3594            $this->seek($LigatureCoverage);
3595            $LigatureGlyphs = implode('|', $this->_getCoverage());
3596
3597
3598            $checkpos = $ptr;
3599            $checkpos--;
3600
3601            // "To position a combining mark using a MarkToLigature attachment subtable, the text-processing client must work backward from the mark to the preceding ligature glyph."
3602            while (isset($this->OTLdata[$checkpos]) && strpos($this->GlyphClassMarks, $this->OTLdata[$checkpos]['hex']) !== false) {
3603                $checkpos--;
3604            }
3605
3606            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$checkpos]) && strpos($LigatureGlyphs, $this->OTLdata[$checkpos]['hex']) !== false) {
3607                $matchedpos = $checkpos;
3608            } else {
3609                $matchedpos = false;
3610            }
3611
3612            if ($matchedpos !== false) {
3613                // Get the relevant MarkRecord
3614                $MarkPos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
3615                $MarkRecord = $this->_getMarkRecord($MarkArray, $MarkPos); // e.g. Array ( [Class] => 0 [AnchorX] => -549 [AnchorY] => 1548 )
3616                //Mark Class is = $MarkRecord['Class']
3617                // Get the relevant LigatureRecord
3618                $this->seek($LigatureArray);
3619                $LigatureCount = $this->read_ushort();
3620                $LigaturePos = strpos($LigatureGlyphs, $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['hex']) / 6;
3621
3622                // Move to the LigatureAttach table Record we want
3623                $nSkip = (2 * $LigaturePos);
3624                $this->skip($nSkip);
3625                $LigatureAttachOffset = $LigatureArray + $this->read_ushort();
3626                $this->seek($LigatureAttachOffset);
3627                $ComponentCount = $this->read_ushort();
3628                $offsets = [];
3629                for ($comp = 0; $comp < $ComponentCount; $comp++) {
3630                    // ComponentRecords
3631                    for ($class = 0; $class < $ClassCount; $class++) {
3632                        $offsets[$comp][$class] = $this->read_ushort();
3633                    }
3634                }
3635
3636                // Get the specific component for this mark attachment
3637                if (isset($this->assocLigs[$matchedpos]) && isset($this->assocMarks[$ptr]['ligPos']) && $this->assocMarks[$ptr]['ligPos'] == $matchedpos) {
3638                    $component = $this->assocMarks[$ptr]['compID'];
3639                } else {
3640                    $component = $ComponentCount - 1;
3641                }
3642
3643                $offset = $offsets[$component][$MarkRecord['Class']];
3644                if ($offset != 0) {
3645                    $LigatureRecordOffset = $offset + $LigatureAttachOffset;
3646                    list($x, $y) = $this->_getAnchorTable($LigatureRecordOffset);
3647                    $LigatureRecord = ['AnchorX' => $x, 'AnchorY' => $y];
3648
3649                    // Need default XAdvance for Ligature glyph
3650                    $LigatureWidth = $this->mpdf->_getCharWidth($this->mpdf->CurrentFont['cw'], $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['uni']) * $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm'] / 1000; // convert back to font design units
3651                    $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth'] = $LigatureWidth;
3652                    // And any intervening (ignored)characters
3653                    if (($ptr - $matchedpos) > 1) {
3654                        for ($i = $matchedpos + 1; $i < $ptr; $i++) {
3655                            $LigatureWidthExtra = $this->mpdf->_getCharWidth($this->mpdf->CurrentFont['cw'], $this->OTLdata[$i]['uni']) * $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm'] / 1000; // convert back to font design units
3656                            $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth'] += $LigatureWidthExtra;
3657                        }
3658                    }
3659
3660                    // Align to previous Ligature by attachment - so need to add to previous placement values
3661                    if (isset($this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement'])) {
3662                        $prevXPlacement = $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement'];
3663                    } else {
3664                        $prevXPlacement = 0;
3665                    }
3666                    if (isset($this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement'])) {
3667                        $prevYPlacement = $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement'];
3668                    } else {
3669                        $prevYPlacement = 0;
3670                    }
3671
3672                    $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement'] = $prevXPlacement + $LigatureRecord['AnchorX'] - $MarkRecord['AnchorX'];
3673                    $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement'] = $prevYPlacement + $LigatureRecord['AnchorY'] - $MarkRecord['AnchorY'];
3674                    if ($this->debugOTL) {
3675                        $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
3676                    }
3677                    return 1;
3678                }
3679            }
3680            return 0;
3681        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3682        // LookupType 6: MarkToMark attachment  Attach a combining mark to another mark
3683        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3684        elseif ($Type == 6) {
3685            $Mark1Coverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // Combining Mark
3686            //$Mark1Coverage is already set in $LuCoverage 0065|0073 etc
3687            $Mark2Coverage = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // Base Mark
3688            $ClassCount = $this->read_ushort(); // Number of classes defined for marks = No. of Combining mark1 glyphs in the MarkCoverage table
3689            $Mark1Array = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // Offset to MarkArray table
3690            $Mark2Array = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // Offset to Mark2Array table
3691            $this->seek($Mark2Coverage);
3692            $Mark2Glyphs = implode('|', $this->_getCoverage());
3693            $checkpos = $ptr;
3694            $checkpos--;
3695            while (isset($this->OTLdata[$checkpos]) && strpos($ignore, $this->OTLdata[$checkpos]['hex']) !== false) {
3696                $checkpos--;
3697            }
3698            if (isset($this->OTLdata[$checkpos]) && strpos($Mark2Glyphs, $this->OTLdata[$checkpos]['hex']) !== false) {
3699                $matchedpos = $checkpos;
3700            } else {
3701                $matchedpos = false;
3702            }
3703
3704            if ($matchedpos !== false) {
3705                // Get the relevant MarkRecord
3706                $Mark1Pos = $LuCoverage[$currGID];
3707                $Mark1Record = $this->_getMarkRecord($Mark1Array, $Mark1Pos); // e.g. Array ( [Class] => 0 [AnchorX] => -549 [AnchorY] => 1548 )
3708                //Mark Class is = $Mark1Record['Class']
3709                // Get the relevant Mark2Record
3710                $this->seek($Mark2Array);
3711                $Mark2Count = $this->read_ushort();
3712                $Mark2Pos = strpos($Mark2Glyphs, $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['hex']) / 6;
3713
3714                // Move to the Mark2Record we want
3715                $nSkip = (2 * $Mark2Pos * $ClassCount );
3716                $this->skip($nSkip);
3717
3718                // Read Mark2Record we want for appropriate Class
3719                $nSkip = 2 * $Mark1Record['Class'];
3720                $this->skip($nSkip);
3721                $Mark2RecordOffset = $Mark2Array + $this->read_ushort();
3722                list($x, $y) = $this->_getAnchorTable($Mark2RecordOffset);
3723                $Mark2Record = ['AnchorX' => $x, 'AnchorY' => $y]; // e.g. Array ( [AnchorX] => 660 [AnchorY] => 1556 )
3724                // Need default XAdvance for Mark2 glyph
3725                $Mark2Width = $this->mpdf->_getCharWidth($this->mpdf->CurrentFont['cw'], $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['uni']) * $this->mpdf->CurrentFont['unitsPerEm'] / 1000; // convert back to font design units
3726                // IF combining marks are set on different components of a ligature glyph, do not apply this rule
3727                // Test: arabictypesetting: &#x625;&#x650;&#x644;&#x64e;&#x649;&#x670;&#x653;
3728                // Test: arabictypesetting: &#x628;&#x651;&#x64e;&#x64a;&#x652;&#x646;&#x64e;&#x643;&#x64f;&#x645;&#x652;
3729                $prevLig = -1;
3730                $thisLig = -1;
3731                $prevComp = -1;
3732                $thisComp = -1;
3733                if (isset($this->assocMarks[$matchedpos])) {
3734                    $prevLig = $this->assocMarks[$matchedpos]['ligPos'];
3735                    $prevComp = $this->assocMarks[$matchedpos]['compID'];
3736                }
3737                if (isset($this->assocMarks[$ptr])) {
3738                    $thisLig = $this->assocMarks[$ptr]['ligPos'];
3739                    $thisComp = $this->assocMarks[$ptr]['compID'];
3740                }
3741
3742                // However IF Mark2 (first in logical order, i.e. being attached to) is not associated with a base, carry on
3743                // This happens in Indic when the Mark being attached to e.g. [Halant Ma lig] -> MatraU,  [U+0B4D + U+B2E as E0F5]-> U+0B41 become E135
3744                if (!defined("OMIT_OTL_FIX_1") || OMIT_OTL_FIX_1 != 1) {
3745                    /* OTL_FIX_1 */
3746                    if (isset($this->assocMarks[$matchedpos]) && ($prevLig != $thisLig || $prevComp != $thisComp )) {
3747                        return 0;
3748                    }
3749                } else {
3750                    /* Original code */
3751                    if ($prevLig != $thisLig || $prevComp != $thisComp) {
3752                        return 0;
3753                    }
3754                }
3755
3756
3757                if (!defined("OMIT_OTL_FIX_2") || OMIT_OTL_FIX_2 != 1) {
3758                    /* OTL_FIX_2 */
3759                    if (!isset($this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth']) || !$this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth']) {
3760                        $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth'] = $Mark2Width;
3761                    }
3762                }
3763
3764                // ZZZ99Q - Test Case font-family: garuda &#xe19;&#xe49;&#xe33;
3765                if (isset($this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth']) && $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth']) {
3766                    $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth'] = $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['BaseWidth'];
3767                }
3768
3769                // Align to previous Mark by attachment - so need to add the previous placement values
3770                $prevXPlacement = (isset($this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement']) ? $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement'] : 0);
3771                $prevYPlacement = (isset($this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement']) ? $this->OTLdata[$matchedpos]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement'] : 0);
3772                $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['XPlacement'] = $prevXPlacement + $Mark2Record['AnchorX'] - $Mark1Record['AnchorX'];
3773                $this->OTLdata[$ptr]['GPOSinfo']['YPlacement'] = $prevYPlacement + $Mark2Record['AnchorY'] - $Mark1Record['AnchorY'];
3774                if ($this->debugOTL) {
3775                    $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
3776                }
3777                return 1;
3778            }
3779            return 0;
3780        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3781        // LookupType 7: Context positioning    Position one or more glyphs in context
3782        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3783        elseif ($Type == 7) {
3784            //===========
3785            // Format 1:
3786            //===========
3787            if ($PosFormat == 1) {
3788                throw new \Mpdf\MpdfException("GPOS Lookup Type " . $Type . " Format " . $PosFormat . " not TESTED YET.");
3789            } //===========
3790            // Format 2:
3791            //===========
3792            elseif ($PosFormat == 2) {
3793                $CoverageTableOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3794                $InputClassDefOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3795                $PosClassSetCnt = $this->read_ushort();
3796                $PosClassSetOffset = [];
3797                for ($b = 0; $b < $PosClassSetCnt; $b++) {
3798                    $offset = $this->read_ushort();
3799                    if ($offset == 0x0000) {
3800                        $PosClassSetOffset[] = $offset;
3801                    } else {
3802                        $PosClassSetOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $offset;
3803                    }
3804                }
3805
3806                $InputClasses = $this->_getClasses($InputClassDefOffset);
3807
3808                for ($s = 0; $s < $PosClassSetCnt; $s++) { // $ChainPosClassSet is ordered by input class-may be NULL
3809                    // Select $PosClassSet if currGlyph is in First Input Class
3810                    if ($PosClassSetOffset[$s] > 0 && isset($InputClasses[$s][$currGID])) {
3811                        $this->seek($PosClassSetOffset[$s]);
3812                        $PosClassRuleCnt = $this->read_ushort();
3813                        $PosClassRule = [];
3814                        for ($b = 0; $b < $PosClassRuleCnt; $b++) {
3815                            $PosClassRule[$b] = $PosClassSetOffset[$s] + $this->read_ushort();
3816                        }
3817
3818                        for ($b = 0; $b < $PosClassRuleCnt; $b++) {  // EACH RULE
3819                            $this->seek($PosClassRule[$b]);
3820                            $InputGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
3821                            $PosCount = $this->read_ushort();
3822
3823                            $Input = [];
3824                            for ($r = 1; $r < $InputGlyphCount; $r++) {
3825                                $Input[$r] = $this->read_ushort();
3826                            }
3827                            $inputClass = $s;
3828
3829                            $inputGlyphs = [];
3830                            $inputGlyphs[0] = $InputClasses[$inputClass];
3831
3832                            if ($InputGlyphCount > 1) {
3833                                //  NB starts at 1
3834                                for ($gcl = 1; $gcl < $InputGlyphCount; $gcl++) {
3835                                    $classindex = $Input[$gcl];
3836                                    if (isset($InputClasses[$classindex])) {
3837                                        $inputGlyphs[$gcl] = $InputClasses[$classindex];
3838                                    } else {
3839                                        $inputGlyphs[$gcl] = '';
3840                                    }
3841                                }
3842                            }
3843
3844                            // Class 0 contains all the glyphs NOT in the other classes
3845                            $class0excl = [];
3846                            for ($gc = 1; $gc <= count($InputClasses); $gc++) {
3847                                if (is_array($InputClasses[$gc])) {
3848                                    $class0excl = $class0excl + $InputClasses[$gc];
3849                                }
3850                            }
3851
3852                            $backtrackGlyphs = [];
3853                            $lookaheadGlyphs = [];
3854
3855                            $matched = $this->checkContextMatchMultipleUni($inputGlyphs, $backtrackGlyphs, $lookaheadGlyphs, $ignore, $ptr, $class0excl);
3856                            if ($matched) {
3857                                for ($p = 0; $p < $PosCount; $p++) { // EACH LOOKUP
3858                                    $SequenceIndex[$p] = $this->read_ushort();
3859                                    $LookupListIndex[$p] = $this->read_ushort();
3860                                }
3861
3862                                for ($p = 0; $p < $PosCount; $p++) {
3863                                    // Apply  $LookupListIndex  at   $SequenceIndex
3864                                    if ($SequenceIndex[$p] >= $InputGlyphCount) {
3865                                        continue;
3866                                    }
3867                                    $lu = $LookupListIndex[$p];
3868                                    $luType = $this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['Type'];
3869                                    $luFlag = $this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['Flag'];
3870                                    $luMarkFilteringSet = $this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'];
3871
3872                                    $luptr = $matched[$SequenceIndex[$p]];
3873                                    $lucurrGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['hex'];
3874                                    $lucurrGID = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['uni'];
3875
3876                                    foreach ($this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['Subtables'] as $luc => $lusubtable_offset) {
3877                                        $shift = $this->_applyGPOSsubtable($lu, $luc, $luptr, $lucurrGlyph, $lucurrGID, ($lusubtable_offset - $this->GPOS_offset + $this->GSUB_length), $luType, $luFlag, $luMarkFilteringSet, $this->LuCoverage[$lu][$luc], $tag, 1, $is_old_spec);
3878                                        if ($this->debugOTL && $shift) {
3879                                            $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
3880                                        }
3881                                        if ($shift) {
3882                                            break;
3883                                        }
3884                                    }
3885                                }
3886
3887                                if (!defined("OMIT_OTL_FIX_3") || OMIT_OTL_FIX_3 != 1) {
3888                                    return $shift;
3889                                } /* OTL_FIX_3 */
3890                                else {
3891                                    return $InputGlyphCount; // should be + matched ignores in Input Sequence
3892                                }
3893                            }
3894                        }
3895                    }
3896                }
3897
3898                return 0;
3899            } //===========
3900            // Format 3:
3901            //===========
3902            elseif ($PosFormat == 3) {
3903                throw new \Mpdf\MpdfException("GPOS Lookup Type " . $Type . " Format " . $PosFormat . " not TESTED YET.");
3904            } else {
3905                throw new \Mpdf\MpdfException("GPOS Lookup Type " . $Type . ", Format " . $PosFormat . " not supported.");
3906            }
3907        } ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3908        // LookupType 8: Chained Context positioning    Position one or more glyphs in chained context
3909        ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
3910        elseif ($Type == 8) {
3911            //===========
3912            // Format 1:
3913            //===========
3914            if ($PosFormat == 1) {
3915                throw new \Mpdf\MpdfException("GPOS Lookup Type " . $Type . " Format " . $PosFormat . " not TESTED YET.");
3916                return 0;
3917            } //===========
3918            // Format 2:
3919            //===========
3920            elseif ($PosFormat == 2) {
3921                $CoverageTableOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3922                $BacktrackClassDefOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3923                $InputClassDefOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3924                $LookaheadClassDefOffset = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort();
3925                $ChainPosClassSetCnt = $this->read_ushort();
3926                $ChainPosClassSetOffset = [];
3927                for ($b = 0; $b < $ChainPosClassSetCnt; $b++) {
3928                    $offset = $this->read_ushort();
3929                    if ($offset == 0x0000) {
3930                        $ChainPosClassSetOffset[] = $offset;
3931                    } else {
3932                        $ChainPosClassSetOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $offset;
3933                    }
3934                }
3935
3936                $BacktrackClasses = $this->_getClasses($BacktrackClassDefOffset);
3937                $InputClasses = $this->_getClasses($InputClassDefOffset);
3938                $LookaheadClasses = $this->_getClasses($LookaheadClassDefOffset);
3939
3940                for ($s = 0; $s < $ChainPosClassSetCnt; $s++) { // $ChainPosClassSet is ordered by input class-may be NULL
3941                    // Select $ChainPosClassSet if currGlyph is in First Input Class
3942                    if ($ChainPosClassSetOffset[$s] > 0 && isset($InputClasses[$s][$currGID])) {
3943                        $this->seek($ChainPosClassSetOffset[$s]);
3944                        $ChainPosClassRuleCnt = $this->read_ushort();
3945                        $ChainPosClassRule = [];
3946                        for ($b = 0; $b < $ChainPosClassRuleCnt; $b++) {
3947                            $ChainPosClassRule[$b] = $ChainPosClassSetOffset[$s] + $this->read_ushort();
3948                        }
3949
3950                        for ($b = 0; $b < $ChainPosClassRuleCnt; $b++) {  // EACH RULE
3951                            $this->seek($ChainPosClassRule[$b]);
3952                            $BacktrackGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
3953                            $Backtrack = [];
3954                            for ($r = 0; $r < $BacktrackGlyphCount; $r++) {
3955                                $Backtrack[$r] = $this->read_ushort();
3956                            }
3957                            $InputGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
3958                            $Input = [];
3959                            for ($r = 1; $r < $InputGlyphCount; $r++) {
3960                                $Input[$r] = $this->read_ushort();
3961                            }
3962                            $LookaheadGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
3963                            $Lookahead = [];
3964                            for ($r = 0; $r < $LookaheadGlyphCount; $r++) {
3965                                $Lookahead[$r] = $this->read_ushort();
3966                            }
3967
3968                            $inputClass = $s; //???
3969
3970                            $inputGlyphs = [];
3971                            $inputGlyphs[0] = $InputClasses[$inputClass];
3972
3973                            if ($InputGlyphCount > 1) {
3974                                //  NB starts at 1
3975                                for ($gcl = 1; $gcl < $InputGlyphCount; $gcl++) {
3976                                    $classindex = $Input[$gcl];
3977                                    if (isset($InputClasses[$classindex])) {
3978                                        $inputGlyphs[$gcl] = $InputClasses[$classindex];
3979                                    } else {
3980                                        $inputGlyphs[$gcl] = '';
3981                                    }
3982                                }
3983                            }
3984
3985                            // Class 0 contains all the glyphs NOT in the other classes
3986                            $class0excl = [];
3987                            for ($gc = 1; $gc <= count($InputClasses); $gc++) {
3988                                if (isset($InputClasses[$gc]) && is_array($InputClasses[$gc])) {
3989                                    $class0excl = $class0excl + $InputClasses[$gc];
3990                                }
3991                            }
3992
3993                            if ($BacktrackGlyphCount) {
3994                                $backtrackGlyphs = [];
3995                                for ($gcl = 0; $gcl < $BacktrackGlyphCount; $gcl++) {
3996                                    $classindex = $Backtrack[$gcl];
3997                                    if (isset($BacktrackClasses[$classindex])) {
3998                                        $backtrackGlyphs[$gcl] = $BacktrackClasses[$classindex];
3999                                    } else {
4000                                        $backtrackGlyphs[$gcl] = '';
4001                                    }
4002                                }
4003                            } else {
4004                                $backtrackGlyphs = [];
4005                            }
4006
4007                            // Class 0 contains all the glyphs NOT in the other classes
4008                            $bclass0excl = [];
4009                            for ($gc = 1; $gc <= count($BacktrackClasses); $gc++) {
4010                                if (isset($BacktrackClasses[$gc]) && is_array($BacktrackClasses[$gc])) {
4011                                    $bclass0excl = $bclass0excl + $BacktrackClasses[$gc];
4012                                }
4013                            }
4014
4015                            if ($LookaheadGlyphCount) {
4016                                $lookaheadGlyphs = [];
4017                                for ($gcl = 0; $gcl < $LookaheadGlyphCount; $gcl++) {
4018                                    $classindex = $Lookahead[$gcl];
4019                                    if (isset($LookaheadClasses[$classindex])) {
4020                                        $lookaheadGlyphs[$gcl] = $LookaheadClasses[$classindex];
4021                                    } else {
4022                                        $lookaheadGlyphs[$gcl] = '';
4023                                    }
4024                                }
4025                            } else {
4026                                $lookaheadGlyphs = [];
4027                            }
4028
4029                            // Class 0 contains all the glyphs NOT in the other classes
4030                            $lclass0excl = [];
4031                            for ($gc = 1; $gc <= count($LookaheadClasses); $gc++) {
4032                                if (isset($LookaheadClasses[$gc]) && is_array($LookaheadClasses[$gc])) {
4033                                    $lclass0excl = $lclass0excl + $LookaheadClasses[$gc];
4034                                }
4035                            }
4036
4037                            $matched = $this->checkContextMatchMultipleUni($inputGlyphs, $backtrackGlyphs, $lookaheadGlyphs, $ignore, $ptr, $class0excl, $bclass0excl, $lclass0excl);
4038                            if ($matched) {
4039                                $PosCount = $this->read_ushort();
4040                                $SequenceIndex = [];
4041                                $LookupListIndex = [];
4042                                for ($p = 0; $p < $PosCount; $p++) { // EACH LOOKUP
4043                                    $SequenceIndex[$p] = $this->read_ushort();
4044                                    $LookupListIndex[$p] = $this->read_ushort();
4045                                }
4046
4047                                for ($p = 0; $p < $PosCount; $p++) {
4048                                    // Apply  $LookupListIndex  at   $SequenceIndex
4049                                    if ($SequenceIndex[$p] >= $InputGlyphCount) {
4050                                        continue;
4051                                    }
4052                                    $lu = $LookupListIndex[$p];
4053                                    $luType = $this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['Type'];
4054                                    $luFlag = $this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['Flag'];
4055                                    $luMarkFilteringSet = $this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['MarkFilteringSet'];
4056
4057                                    $luptr = $matched[$SequenceIndex[$p]];
4058                                    $lucurrGlyph = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['hex'];
4059                                    $lucurrGID = $this->OTLdata[$luptr]['uni'];
4060
4061                                    foreach ($this->GPOSLookups[$lu]['Subtables'] as $luc => $lusubtable_offset) {
4062                                        $shift = $this->_applyGPOSsubtable($lu, $luc, $luptr, $lucurrGlyph, $lucurrGID, ($lusubtable_offset - $this->GPOS_offset + $this->GSUB_length), $luType, $luFlag, $luMarkFilteringSet, $this->LuCoverage[$lu][$luc], $tag, 1, $is_old_spec);
4063                                        if ($this->debugOTL && $shift) {
4064                                            $this->_dumpproc('GPOS', $lookupID, $subtable, $Type, $PosFormat, $ptr, $currGlyph, $level);
4065                                        }
4066                                        if ($shift) {
4067                                            break;
4068                                        }
4069                                    }
4070                                }
4071
4072                                if (!defined("OMIT_OTL_FIX_3") || OMIT_OTL_FIX_3 != 1) {
4073                                    return $shift;
4074                                } /* OTL_FIX_3 */
4075                                else {
4076                                    return $InputGlyphCount; // should be + matched ignores in Input Sequence
4077                                }
4078                            }
4079                        }
4080                    }
4081                }
4082
4083                return 0;
4084            } //===========
4085            // Format 3:
4086            //===========
4087            elseif ($PosFormat == 3) {
4088                $BacktrackGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
4089                for ($b = 0; $b < $BacktrackGlyphCount; $b++) {
4090                    $CoverageBacktrackOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // in glyph sequence order
4091                }
4092                $InputGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
4093                for ($b = 0; $b < $InputGlyphCount; $b++) {
4094                    $CoverageInputOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // in glyph sequence order
4095                }
4096                $LookaheadGlyphCount = $this->read_ushort();
4097                for ($b = 0; $b < $LookaheadGlyphCount; $b++) {
4098                    $CoverageLookaheadOffset[] = $subtable_offset + $this->read_ushort(); // in glyph sequence order
4099                }
4100                $PosCount = $this->read_ushort();
4101                $save_pos = $this->_pos; // Save the point just after PosCount
4102
4103                $CoverageBacktrackGlyphs = [];
4104                for ($b = 0; $b < $BacktrackGlyphCount; $b++) {
4105                    $this->seek($CoverageBacktrackOffset[$b]);
4106                    $glyphs = $this->_getCoverage();
4107                    $CoverageBacktrackGlyphs[$b] = implode("|", $glyphs);
4108                }
4109                $CoverageInputGlyphs = [];
4110                for ($b = 0; $b < $InputGlyphCount; $b++) {
4111                    $this->seek($CoverageInputOffset[$b]);
4112                    $glyphs = $this->_getCoverage();
4113                    $CoverageInputGlyphs[$b] = implode("|", $glyphs);
4114                }
4115                $CoverageLookaheadGlyphs = [];
4116                for ($b = 0; $b < $LookaheadGlyphCount; $b++) {
4117                    $this->seek($CoverageLookaheadOffset[$b]);
4118                    $glyphs = $this->_getCoverage();
4119                    $CoverageLookaheadGlyphs[$b] = implode("|", $glyphs);
4120                }
4121                $matched = $this->checkContextMatchMultiple($CoverageInputGlyphs, $CoverageBacktrackGlyphs, $CoverageLookaheadGlyphs, $ignore, $ptr);
4122                if ($matched) {
4123                    $this->seek($save_pos); // Return to just after PosCount
